story:
Who am I?

Hi there! My name is Len du Randt, and I've written, co-written and ghost-written three novels and a ton of shorter stories, both under my name and various pen names.

You can see some of my books at: Len's Amazon Author Profile Page

Some praise for my novel, The Son of Perdition:


A different kind of How To...

Over the years, I've received countless mails, asking me for advice on certain technical aspects of writing a novel. As I answered the mails, I thought about creating a HOW-TO guide about writing one. The problem was that the market had been saturated with thousands of these books already, most written by industry A-Listers.

I then took a look at the online video tutorials, and although there are a few good ones available in that space, they all seemed to follow the same pattern: They give you the theory of all the different elements that goes into a novel, but fall short when it comes to the practical side of implementing that theory into your own work.

The idea for the Online Video Course was born when I sat down to plan my next novel, The Entity.  I realized that I could use this opportunity to help others by recording the entire process from conception to publishing, showing aspiring authors exactly how I go about planning, plotting, writing and self-publishing a full-length novel. The course is structured in such a way that if the viewer follows the process discussed in each video, that they would end up writing and self-publishing their novels WITH  me instead of just working through endless theory.

Your contribution today would not only mean that I can achieve my goal of building this online video course, but also help aspiring authors all over the world, to reach their dream of writing and publishing their own novels.



What topics will the course cover?

Because this is not a standard HOW TO WRITE course where I just tell you about creating characters and plotting, etc., I would need a few days in structuring the course outline. Check back every now and again, and feel free to throw in your comments and suggestions as well.


That said, there is not one single thing that I will do for The Entity that I will not disclose with the viewers. Everything from naming the characters to foreshadowing to planning the perfect ending will be looked at and discussed.



Tell me more about The Entity

After writing The Incubus and Succubus books, I still felt that I didn't go as "scary" as I would have liked. Something kept nagging at me, challenging me to try and write the scariest story that I could, but because of other commitments, I only had time to give the story a title before shelving it under my TO DO list.


As a motivation to keep myself accountable for eventually getting back to the project, I commissioned a graphic designer (the same one who created the covers for Son of Perdition, Incubus and Succubus) to create the cover for me so long.

With some money now invested into the book, I knew that I could no longer abandon the story, and it was just a matter of time before I would put pen to paper again.


Well, ladies and gentlemen... that time is now...




What I need to get this done

I've set the funding limit to $8,000 mainly for time and resources. I would require equipment (microphone, video recorder, etc) in order to create the course, but my main reason behind this campaign is for my time. I would need to set aside three to five months in order to create, edit and publish everything. That's three to five months that I can't promote my own work or tackle other projects (like ghost writing stories for other authors, etc.).

In return for your generous assistance, I have created a few exciting perks that I think might be worth looking at. Check it out and see if there's something in particular you'd like.



What happens if you raise less than $8k?

The show still goes on! It might take a few months longer to reach my final goal, but you can rest assured that both The Entity and the Write and Publish a Novel with Me video course will see the light of day in 2016.



What happens when you raise more than $8k?

If that happens, I will re-invest the funds into other writer-related video courses as well as begin working on a Writer's App that I currently have brewing in the planning phase.


Risks & Challenges

As with all things in life, there are certain risks and challenges that could hinder any project, regardless of how "fool proof" you think it might be. I could break my wrist, for example, which could delay the project with a few weeks or months even. A burglar might break into my home while my family and I are asleep and steal my laptop. That's happened before. 

Regardless of anything that might go wrong, I WILL finish the video course, and I WILL  finish writing The Entity.

I will ensure that I make daily backups (onsite and offsite) of everything I do so that I can stick to my 3 to 4-month goal limit. If I break my wrist, I will use dictation software to write the book. Either way, one way or another, this project will get completed.



No Cash? No Worries! You can still help!

Some people unfortunately just can't contribute financially, no matter how much they'd like to, and there's absolutely nothing wrong with that! It doesn't mean, however, that you still can't help in some way or another!

How?

  • Go ahead and use the Indiegogo share tools! (Check the bar on the left)
  • Next, make a noise about this campaign from your own social media accounts
  • Follow me on Facebook and Twitter, and then just share and re-tweet the posts that I make on there

Please let me know about your efforts so that I can arrange a perk for you too!


Thank you for helping me in my goal to help others write their novels!

YOU ROCK! :)

story:
Cos'è Wastad e come funziona?

Wastad è la prima piattaforma pubblicitaria che rispetta gli spazi degli utenti. E' basata su QRcode stampati su carta igienica, carta cucina, cartoni della pizza e sacchi per rifiuti. 

Su questi supporti vengono stampati degli appositi QR che, senza indizi che ne svelino il contenuto, potranno mostrare agli utenti contenuti altamente profilati, geolocalizzati e particolarmente vantaggiosi.

 La curiosità è il fulcro attorno al quale ruota Wastad.

Una volta scansionato il QR le persone vedranno contenuti personalizzati secondo i loro interessi (video, sconti, coupon, app, games, landing page a tema, concorsi etc.) sponsorizzati dai nostri partner inserzionisti.  

Le persone decideranno in modo consapevole di attivare i messaggi pubblicitari istantanei in una vera e propria caccia al tesoro.


Team

In basso da sinistra il team: Davide, Nastassya e Luca

In alto da sinistra alcuni attori del video: Alma, Miriam, Giacomo e Giacomo


Ci siamo conosciuti su Twitter, e da un semplice follow alla pagina di Wastad è nata una storia di complicità e rispetto sfociata nella condivisione di questo progetto. 

Nastassya si concentra sugli aspetti della comunicazione, spirito creativo del gruppo, eccellente videomaker e copywriter si integra in modo complementare a Luca più dedito alla programmazione front-end e alla user experience; ogni suono prima di essere approvato passa da lui. Davide è l’amministratore, appassionato di marketing si occupa delle pubbliche relazioni e dello sviluppo commerciale della startup. 


Perché ti conviene contribuire se sei un'azienda che investe nella pubblicità online?


Chi decide di promuovere il proprio brand con noi, prima di tutto sa cosa significa lasciare i propri spazi agli utenti, sa che l’attenzione si guadagna coinvolgendo e non “martellando”. 

Wastad unisce la gamification all'advertising, passando per l'ecologia, grazie a supporti rigorosamente usa e getta.

Chi decide di utilizzare la nostra piattaforma è cosciente anche dei seguenti vantaggi:

  1. La fruizione non invasiva dei contenuti pubblicitari garantisce una percezione positiva del brand

  2. La visualizzazione a schermo intero su smartphone e tablet, senza disturbare, permette di creare un impatto coinvolgente e chiaro migliorando l’interazione e l’efficacia del messaggio pubblicitario

  3. L’alta profilazione degli utenti, attraverso il loro consenso, l’integrazione di open data o di dati in possesso dei nostri inserzionisti aumenta la rilevanza e la pertinenza della pubblicità

  4. L’interazione umana - l’utente deve effettuare la scansione per interagire - è un sistema efficace per garantire visualizzazioni reali e non contaminate da bot.com

  5. La piattaforma non è esposta a software che blocchino la pubblicità (AdBlock)

  6. L’alta diffusione dei supporti (box della pizza, carta igienica…) garantisce un elevato potenziale di traffico in quanto sono supporti di uso quotidiano, basti pensare che andiamo in bagno dalle 6/8 volte al giorno

  7. Viewability ( la viewability è la metrica con cui le piattaforme pubblicitarie ti garantiscono la presenza di una pubblicità di fronte ad un essere umano), nel nostro caso la visualizzazione è 99,9% consapevole.

Siamo convinti che pagare le campagne un tot a CPM equivale a buttare dei volantini per strada e sperare che qualcuno si fermi a leggerli. Buttane 1000, uno viene letto e buttato nel cestino. Questo è il CTR spiegato a mia nonna. CTR medio in Italia pari a 0,01% (fonte CTR medio : Doubleclick 04-2015).

La nostra modalità di pagamento è detta “Pay x scan” perché l’inserzionista ci paga quando l’utente effettua una scansione del QR. Puntiamo sulla qualità quindi più dati verranno richiesti per associare messaggio e pubblico più sarà la tariffa da pagare ( da 0, 20€ a 0,60€ + iva )

La pubblicità invade gli spazi delle persone ed è per questo motivo che risulta fastidiosa. Il mantra nel settore della pubblicità online oggi è garantire il contenuto giusto, alla persona giusta, al momento giusto, partendo da quest’ultimo aspetto crediamo che nessuno meglio dell’utente stesso conosca il momento migliore. Con noi potrà decidere quando cogliere le sue opportunità. Le persone nei momenti di relax potranno vivere un’esperienza personalizzata in modo spensierato rimanendo sorpresi e appagati dall’affinità dei contenuti pubblicitari grazie all’utilizzo dei dati ottenuti consensualmente quando si registrano e utilizzano la nostra app. Diamo la libertà di lasciarsele sfuggire da sotto il naso.


Perché ti conviene contribuire se sei un'azienda che produce carta igienica, sacchi immondizia o cartoni della pizza?


L’altro importante valore del nostro progetto è quello di coinvolgere i produttori di beni di largo consumo, infatti condividiamo i nostri guadagni con i produttori che decidono di diventare nostri partner stampando il nostro QR insieme alla loro grafica.

Conosciamo bene la situazione dei produttori di beni di largo consumo, fai attenzione a questo video così potrai capire il potenziale nascosto che hai se fai parte di questo settore:




I nostri obiettivi 


  1. Creare delle partnership con i vari produttori

  2. Fare raccolta pubblicitaria diretta o indiretta attraverso concessionarie o altre realtà, anche un freelance può collaborare con noi presentandoci il suo portfolio

In questa fase iniziale come intendiamo procedere?


Grazie alle vostre donazioni possiamo far produrre carta igienica da un nostro fornitore, un reward utile e allo stesso tempo potrete testare la nostra app.
Non vogliamo acquistare e vendere carta igienica in futuro ma adesso potrebbe essere conveniente per tutti, voi risparmiate e noi iniziamo a diffondere il nostro QR.

Perché 15.000€?


Per personalizzare la carta igienica dobbiamo rispettare un lotto minimo, quindi più ci avviciniamo meglio è. A noi piacerebbe superare l'obiettivo per garantire addirittura il riordino, perché si sa la carta igienica serve sempre. 
Stiamo valutando anche di attivare una sezione e-commerce sul nostro sito per poter dare continuità a chi vorrà risparmiare comprando da noi. 

Tempistiche


17 Maggio 2016:  fine campagna
Entro i primi di Giugno: lotto di carta igienica pronto
15 Giugno 2016: prime spedizioni
15 Luglio 2016: beta app e piattaforma 
Tra Luglio e Settembre 2016: presentazione in loco nelle città scelte con consegna a mano dei reward.


E' arrivato il tuo momento?
Noi crediamo proprio di sì.


:)

story:
Hello!  Welcome to a world of great science fiction and fantasy!

Abyss and Apex is a quarterly genre magazine that specializes in finding new talent. Twenty-five percent of A&A authors are published in our pages for the first time. We take stories from all over the English-speaking world, plus those who write in that language from as far away as Malaysia. Almost half of our authors are women, and what's more, we get that kind of diversity by simply looking for the new and different.

Abyss & Apex recently found you find new, exciting writers like Celeste Rita Baker, George S. Walker, Sarah Hendrix, Jennifer Dornan-Fish, Kelsey Snyder, and Jeremy Szal.

In the past we brought you early works of Lavie Tidhar, Rhonda S. Garcia, Lawrence Schoen, Aliette de Bodard, Lisa Mantchev, Will McIntosh, Ruth Nestvold, Marie Brennan, N.K. Jemisin, Rae Carson, J. Kathleen Cheney, and Tony Pi.

The first $2,000 raised will cover the new anthology including an exciting new cover by Jeff Lee Johnson! $2,000 more will cover the costs for A&A for one year. Anything past that will get us to conventions like Worldcon and help us towards two goals: becoming a tax-exempt organization and paying pro rates.

If you cannot contribute, then please share!

story:
Turkey is a vital, complex country in flux. Recent economic, political, and social upheavals have been reflected in the country's national obsession - football - which has become a means of control and a site of rebellion*.

I will tell the stories of a range of colourful characters and clubs, including ultras in revolt, power-hungry mayors, Kurdish nationalists fighting through football, women asserting their rights to wear shorts and play sports, Islamist moguls, football stars turned politicians, refugees trying to make a life, great clubs in crisis, gay referees and LGBT teams, and Turkey’s charismatic, controversial ruler: ex-semi-professional footballer and current president Recip Tayip Erdoğan.

This book asks: What is the political potential in Turkish football? What will happen to a sport on the brink of collapse? Where is Turkey heading under the ruling AKP? And what does it mean to be Turkish in the 21st century?

This will be the first book in English that focuses solely on Turkish football and politics.

I have done around half of the reporting for the book. It’s going well but I now need funds to complete the rest of the project. I have exhausted savings and have been financing the project through freelance work, which is extremely time and energy consuming.

The book is being published by the independent London-based publishers I.B.Tauris, who could only provide a small advance. I.B.Tauris will not receive any funds from this campaign - all funds will go towards my reporting expenses.

There are significant travel expenses as I am reporting from across Turkey, and I frequently have to employ fixers and translators (who typically charge between £70 and £150/day).

Please consider contributing to this project – even if it's just a bit of loose change found down the back of the sofa – and please share with others who might be interested.

The deadline for the book is 1st August 2016. This support will allow me to devote the necessary time and resources to the project over the final few months so that I can produce a great piece of work.

Cheers!


About me

I am a British freelance journalist. I have written for Al Jazeera English, Delayed Gratification, the Guardian, the Huffington Post, the Irish Times, the LA Review of Books, Middle East Eye, and the Sunday Herald, among others.

I have an ongoing project about football fans and teams engaged in politics. Some examples of this work include articles on Egyptian football fans accused of terrorism; whether Turkish football might collapse (and whether that might actually be a good thing); and the struggle to resurrect a Turkish football club that was closed down for political reasons following the 1980 military coup.


Background*

Turkey is an emerging regional superpower at a critical point in its history, with much at stake. The ostensible initial economic and political success of the AKP, in power since 2002, is giving way to a more fraught situation in which the economy is faltering, the Kurdish peace process has broken down, terrorism is increasing, regional pressures are mounting – including fallout from the war in neighbouring Syria - and the ruling AKP is becoming increasingly authoritarian.

Under the AKP, local and national authorities have repeatedly intervened in football as it is seen as one of the most effective ways to influence people and boost political and business prospects in Turkey.

Football is also seen by some as a site of rebellion, in which they can challenge racism, homophobia, sexism, and express political alternatives to the government.

The authorities have clamped down hard on dissenting football fans; banning political chanting at matches, introducing the controversial Passolig e-ticketing system, forming and supporting pro-government supporter groups, and even charging football fans with trying to mount a coup d’etat in the wake of the 2013 Gezi Park protests, in which fans of different football teams set aside their fierce rivalries to join forces and play a prominent role in the anti-government demonstrations.

The politicisation of Turkish football has also contributed to a series of crises in the sport. It’s possible that Turkish football could collapse or will have to undergo a total revolution in order to start again.
story_txt:
Turkey is a vital, complex country in flux. Recent economic, political, and social upheavals have been reflected in the country's national obsession - football - which has become a means of control and a site of rebellion*.
I will tell the stories of a range of colourful
characters and clubs, including ultras in revolt, power-hungry
mayors, Kurdish nationalists fighting through football, women asserting their
rights to wear shorts and play sports, Islamist moguls, football stars turned
politicians, refugees trying to make a life, great clubs in crisis, gay
referees and LGBT teams, and Turkey’s charismatic, controversial ruler: ex-semi-professional footballer and current president Recip Tayip Erdoğan.
This book asks: What is the political potential in
Turkish football? What will happen to a sport on the brink of collapse? Where
is Turkey heading under the ruling AKP? And what does it mean to be Turkish in the 21st
century?
This will be the first book in English that focuses solely on Turkish
football and politics.
I have done around half of the reporting for the book. It’s going well but I now need funds to complete the rest of the project. I have exhausted
savings and have been financing the project through freelance work, which is
extremely time and energy consuming.
The book is being published by the independent London-based publishers
I.B.Tauris, who could only provide a small advance. I.B.Tauris will not receive
any funds from this campaign - all funds will go towards my reporting expenses.
There are significant travel expenses as I am reporting from across
Turkey, and I frequently have to employ fixers and translators (who typically charge between £70 and £150/day).
Please consider contributing to this project – even if it's just a bit of
loose change found down the back of the sofa – and please share with others who
might be interested.
The deadline for the book is 1st August 2016. This support will
allow me to devote the necessary time and resources to the project over the final
few months so that I can produce a great piece of work.
Cheers!
About me
I am a British freelance journalist. I have written
for Al Jazeera English, Delayed Gratification, the Guardian, the Huffington
Post, the Irish Times, the LA Review of Books, Middle East Eye, and the Sunday
Herald, among others.
I have an ongoing project about football fans and
teams engaged in politics. Some examples of this work include articles on
Egyptian football fans accused of terrorism; whether
Turkish football might collapse
(and whether that might actually be a good thing); and the struggle to resurrect
a Turkish football club that was closed down for political reasons
following the 1980 military coup.
Background*

Turkey is an emerging regional superpower at a critical point in its
history, with much at stake. The ostensible initial economic and political
success of the AKP, in power since 2002, is giving way to a more fraught
situation in which the economy is faltering, the Kurdish peace process has
broken down, terrorism is increasing, regional pressures are mounting –
including fallout from the war in neighbouring Syria - and the ruling AKP is
becoming increasingly authoritarian. 
Under the AKP, local and national authorities have
repeatedly intervened in football as it is seen as one of the most effective
ways to influence people and boost political and business prospects in Turkey.
Football is also seen by some as a site of rebellion, in which they can challenge racism, homophobia, sexism, and express political alternatives to the government.

The authorities have clamped down hard on dissenting football
fans; banning political chanting
at matches, introducing the controversial Passolig e-ticketing system, forming
and supporting pro-government supporter groups, and even charging football fans
with trying to mount a coup d’etat in the wake of the 2013 Gezi Park protests,
in which fans of different football teams set aside their fierce rivalries to
join forces and play a prominent role in the anti-government demonstrations. 


The politicisation of Turkish football has also contributed
to a series of crises in the sport. It’s possible that Turkish football
could collapse or will have to undergo a total revolution in order to start
again.

story:
What is the story of your life? You can do great things, but sometimes you may feel stuck. Journaling helps. 

The Lucid Note will help you feel smart, creative, and capable. Because you are! 




Connect to your travels, fuel your creative eye, and find ways to make the world a better place with the LucidNote.




How is the Lucid Note different from other blank journals?

If you don't already see yourself as a journaler, the prompts in this notebook will inspire you with ideas to think about and write about.  

If you're already familiar with the benefits of journaling, the organization of the Lucid Note will make it easier to find and enjoy your memories.

Why would I write in a journal if I could take notes on my phone? 

1. Writing is more organic.

2. Writing is a more creative act.

3. Research has shown that the act of putting pen to paper actually lights up areas of the brain connected to learning and idea generation.

4. You're not going to look back at your phone in future years.

Why the small size? 

The Lucid Note is designed to fit in your pocket or purse, so you can record your ideas and inspirations on-the-go.

Why is there a cover with removable inserts?

Additional inserts can be used at different times or for different purposes.

Is there Science/Proof this works?

While the Lucid Note is artfully designed, proven positive psychology is incorporated into the prompts.

What is your vision for the future?

To continue to create products that engage, educate and empower people.

The first journal insert is the "Inspire" version, appropriate for anyone interested in making their life as meaningful as possible.  Future versions will be targeted to specific purposes and audiences. 


I asked an experienced group of world travelers, artists and entrepreneurs to share what they journal about to build the Lucid Note.

  • The youngest person to climb Mt. Everest as well as NFL and Olympic  athletes and coaches share prompts that will lead to improved mental clarity. 
  • Travel writers share prompts and quotes that will inspire you to look beyond the usual when recording your travels.
  • A world-class fashion designer shares wisdom about finding your purpose for life and creative endeavors. 
  • Everyday entrepreneurs share suggestions that will inspire you to look for ways that you can solve problems and add value to the world.



After a rather directionless youth, a confluence of circumstances led to my being passionately interested in self-development; I not only wanted to reach my own greatest potential but I wanted to be instrumental in helping other people attain theirs.


I found that I kept writing about similar ideas, regardless of who I interviewed or studied. It occurred to me that these ideas could be the cornerstones to an inspirational journal. If I turned these ideas into prompts, that would help me, or whoever has the notebook, think like the thought leaders of the day. 



Every aspect of this business has been well thought out. You can be assured that your help on this campaign plays a crucial role in the foundation of a great company. Our mission is to inspire the adventurous, creative and entrepreneurial spark in all of us.

In May, as I was graduating from college, the first version of the Lucid Note was handwritten.

A small group beta-tested the concept. Responses were enthusiastically positive. We decided it was worth testing on a bigger scale. 

We went to the high-end leather manufacturer of my prized journal cover and ordered our first run of 50 Lucid Notes. I paid for these prototypes out of my personal savings with a little bit of trepidation and a LOT of excitement! 

I couldn’t wait to get my product out to a larger audience! I brought them to a youth leadership camp I volunteer at in the summer. At first, I had to explain what the notebook was all about. By the end of the week, I had people coming up to me and asking for one! This was when I realized the Lucid Note was something special. 

My goal with this product is to help the user become more adventurous, creative, and entrepreneurial - to develop to their fullest potential in alignment with their deepest dreams and desires.

Risks and challenges

Although it is our goal to get it in your hands as soon as possible, please understand that setbacks do arise in terms of manufacturing and shipping.

All we ask for in advance is patience and that backers respond to the information survey as quickly as possible after this campaign ends so we can get your journal in your hands ASAP.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please help get the word out and make some noise about the campaign.
  • Share with friends and family in your FB, email, and text networks. 
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Прикупио сам све!

Можете и даље постати претплатници и приложници али кампања је остварена. Спасли сте ме.
Click Here for English!        Cliquez ici pour le français !      Прочитај више на српском

Ја сам Андреј Фајгељ, дисидент. Због критике власти прети ми пет година затвора и избацивање породице на улицу. Са интернета су ме већ избацили и ово је моја последња шанса.

Хоћу да се борим. Али не могу без подршке. Помозите ми да повратим средства за рад и издам књигу, како бисмо барем замислили време "После Вучића".

Ако могућност плаћања преко Пеј Пала не ради

Уплатите директно са Пеј Пала на рачун fajgelj@gmail.com

Ако не плаћате преко интернета

-За динарске уплате из Србије:
рачун: 160-5500100713374-64
сврха уплате: прилог за књигу
прималац: Андреј Фајгељ

-За девизне уплате из иностранства:
BCITITMM
Intesa Sanpaolo spa
Milano
Italy

DBDBRSBG
Banca Intesa ad Beograd
Milentija Popovica 7b, 11070 Novi Beograd
Republic of Serbia

IBANRS35160553020045092072
ANDREJ FAJGELJ

Српски

Како пролазе дисиденти у Србији?

Ја сам Андреј Фајгељ и усудио сам се да мислим својом главом.

Због тога сам прогресивно избациван из јавности. Из организација које сам оснивао, са пројеката које сам водио, из новина у којима сам објављивао најчитаније чланке а сада не смеју да ме објављују.

На крају ми је остало последње уточиште слободе, оно што би свако од нас требало да има, мој дом и мој простор на интернету. 

Кад сам имао шта да кажем, своје мишљење сам изразио у свом дому, својим речима, снимио на свом рачунару и објавио на свом блогу и својим друштвеним мрежама. Свој на своме. Никоме нисам куцао на врата. Али мени јесу покуцали на врата. 

У наш дом упале су специјалне полицијске снаге, одузеле моје рачунаре, одвеле ме пред мојом децом и стрпале ме у затвор.

Вучић је лагао: "Ни у једној земљи не би био пуштен. Ни у једној земљи на свету. Ни у једној земљи на свету. Дакле од Аргентине до Канаде, од Аустралије до Русије и скандинавских земаља, нигде никада не би био пуштен."

Писао сам амбасадама поменутих земаља, и другима, питајући да ли је истина да бих у њиховим земљама због критике Вучића и НАТО на Фејсбуку био ухапшен и никада не бих био пуштен. Нисам добио одговор.

Либерали су толики фолиранти. Нама овде тиранин може главе да сече. Док су њихови интереси заштићени, они ће бити задовољни. Вредности, демократија, људска права, слободе, с тим се они само исмевају.

Мени није смешно. И даље ми као државном непријатељу прети пет година затвора. Још увек ми не враћају рачунаре.

Покушао сам да се снађем. Купио сам на кредит неки лошији рачунар. Међутим и он се, под мистериозним околностима, покватио. Такође, мистериозно ми је оборен и блог. Мени је рачунар и средство за рад. Тако да ми је поред националног рада угрожен и професионални рад и постоји опасност да останем без посла.

Ако останем без посла, остаћу и без овог дома, и са четворо деце ћу завршити на улици.

Ето тако пролазе дисиденти у Србији. Врата затворена, руке везане, уста запушена, судбина запечаћена.

Да ја говорим само против Вучића, не бих имао проблема. Постоје многи опозиционари који имају и финансије и пролаз у медије и сваку другу подршку. Мој проблем је што говорим против либерално-прогресивне догме која стоји и иза Вучића и иза НАТО и иза глобализма.

Они имају сву подршку и они раде за оног ко их плаћа, а коме да се обратимо ми који пристајемо да радимо само за свој народ? Ко је народ?

Народ си ти. И ја само теби могу да се обратим.

У поквареном рачунару је остао нацрт књиге чији наслов је „После Вучића“. У тој књизи објашњавам како је могуће сменити не само Вучића већ и либерално-прогресивну догму која стоји иза њега. Уколико се то не уради, после Вучића долази Вучић.

Ако желиш да књига буде објављена, можеш бити приложник или претплатник. Уплатом одређених средстава на динарски рачун из Србије или онјлајн плаћањем на платформи Индигого.

Знам да немате новца као ни ми. Знам да се и друге породице налазе пред опасношћу да заврше на улици. Знам да су и бољи људи и горе пролазили радећи за народ. Знам да постоје и прече потребе.

Али исто тако знам да народ може бити слободан само ако се за слободу бори. Наш српски народ је и у најцрњим данима турског ропства имао хајдуке који су били кадри стићи, утећи, и на страшном месту постојати. Који су били спремни да се боре за слободу против империје. Али ни хајдуци нису могли без јатака.

Ја хоћу и могу да се борим. Могу да објавим књигу пре избора и утичем да се ствари промене. Али без подршке руке су ми везане. Овај пут се не питам ја. Ви ћете одлучили да ли је ово моја последња објава или сам тек почео.

Помоћи ћете ми ако проширите ову вест. Помоћи ћете ми ако уплатите један динар.

Јер сваки динар од свог народа вреди више од милиона од странаца.

English

What happens to dissidents in Serbia?

I am Andrej Fajgelj and I deared to think for myself.

For that, I was "progressively" banished from public life. From the organizations that I've founded, projects that I’ve led, from the newspapers I’ve written some of the most popular articles for and which now don't dare to publish me.

In the end, all I was left with was the last refuge of freedom, which each of us should have, my home and my space on the Internet. When I had something to say, I voiced my opinion in my own home, in my own words, recorded it on my own computer and published it on my own blog and my own social network accounts. I knocked on no doors. But someone did knock on my door.

Our home was raided by special police forces, they seized my computers, arrested me in front of my children and put me in jail.

Vucic lied: "No other country would release him. No country in the world. No country in the world. From Argentina to Canada, from Australia to Russia and Scandinavian countries no one would never ever release him."

I wrote to the embassies of the countries mentioned, and others, asking if it was true that in their countries I would be arrested for criticizing Vucic and NATO on Facebook, never to be released. I got no answer.

Liberals are so fake! Here, the tyrant might as well cut off our heads. As long as their interests are protected, they will be satisfied. Values, democracy, human rights, freedoms, they are making fun of all that.

I don’t find that funny. As a public enemy, I am still facing five years in prison. They are still withholding my computers.

I tried to get along. I took out credit to buy a lower quality computer. But it broke down under mysterious circumstances. My blog mysteriously went down as well.

The computer is also my work equipment. Besides my public activity, my professional activity is at risk, and I'm in danger of losing my job. If I lose my job, I will lose my home, and end up homeless with four children.

This is what happens to dissidents in Serbia. Doors closed, hands tied, mouth closed, fate sealed.

If I spoke only against Vucic, I would have no problems. Many members of the opposition have finances and media coverage and all other support. My problem is that I am speaking against the liberal-progressive dogma that stands behind Vucic and behind NATO and behind globalism.

They have all the support and they work for those who are paying them, but to whom can we turn, we who agree only to work for our own people? Who is the people?

The people is you. You are the only one I can turn to.

In the broken computer, I had a draft of a book titled "After Vucic". In this book, I am explaining how it is possible to replace not only Vucic but also the liberal-progressive dogma that lies behind him. If this is not done, after Vucic, there will be Vucic.

If you want the book to be published, you can become a donor or a subscriber by paying into the Serbian bank account or online through Indiegogo.

I know that like us, you don’t have no money. I know that other families too are facing the danger of ending in the street. I know that better people have endured worse things for working for people. I know that there are more urgent needs.

But I also know that only the people fighting for freedom can be free. Even in the darkest days of the Ottoman occupation, our Serbian people had hajduks who were “able to accost, to evade and to endure on terrible place”. Who were willing to fight for freedom against the empire. But even hajduks couldn’t exist without support.

I want to fight and I can. I can publish the book before the elections and make a difference. But without support my hands are tied. It is not up to me this time. You will decide if this is my last announcement, or if I have just started.

You will help me if you share this news. You will help me if you donate one cent.

Because each cent from one’s own people is worth more than millions from foreign powers.

Français

Quel est le destin des dissidents en Serbie?

Je suis Andrej Fajgelj et j’ai osé penser librement.

A cause de cela, j’étais progressivement banni de la vie publique : des organisations que j’ai fondées, des projets que j’ai menés, des journaux, pour lesquels j’écrivais des articles les plus lus et qui n’osent plus me publier.

Finalement, j’étais réduit au dernier refuge de la liberté, celui que nous devrions tous avoir, ma maison familiale, et mon espace sur internet. Quand j’ai eu quelque chose à dire, j’ai exprimé mon opinion chez moi, avec mes propres mots, je l’ai enregistré sur mon ordinateur et publié sur mon blog et mes réseaux sociaux. Soi-même chez soi. Je n’ai pas frappé à la porte de personne. Mais on a frappé à la mienne.

Notre maison a été perquisitionnée par les forces spéciales de la police, ils ont saisi mes ordinateurs, m'ont arrêté devant mes enfants et m’ont mis en détention.

Vucic mentait: «En aucun pays il ne serait pas libéré. Aucun pays au monde. Aucun pays au monde. De l’Argentine au Canada, de l’Australie à la Russie et aux pays scandinaves, il ne serait libéré nulle part, jamais. »

J’ai écrit aux ambassades des pays mentionnés, et aux autres, en demandant s’il était vrai que dans leurs pays je serais arrêté pour avoir critiqué Vucic et l’OTAN sur Facebook, et je ne serais libéré jamais. Je n’ai pas eu de réponse.

Quels hypocrites ces libéraux ! Ici, le tyran peut bien couper nos têtes. Tant que leurs intérêts sont protégés, ils sont contents. Valeurs, démocratie, droits de l’homme, libertés, ils s’en moquent de tout ça.

Ça ne me fait pas rigoler. En tant qu’ennemi public, je risque toujours cinq ans de prison ferme. Ils retiennent toujours mes ordinateurs.

J’ai essayé de me débrouiller. J’ai acheté un ordinateur moins performant à crédit. Mais il est tombé en panne dans des conditions mystérieuses. Mon blog est aussi mystérieusement en panne.

Mon ordinateur est aussi un outil de travail. En plus de l’activisme, mon activité professionnelle se trouve menacée aussi, et le danger de perdre mon emploi est réel. Si je perds mon emploi je perdrai ma maison, et je finirai à la rue avec quatre enfants.

Tel est le destin des dissidents en Serbie. Portes fermées, mains liées, bouche scotchée, sort scellé.

Si je ne parlais que contre Vucic, je n’aurais pas de problèmes. De nombreux membres de l’opposition ont les finances et la couverture médiatique et tout autre soutien. Mon problème est de parler contre le dogme libéral-progressiste qui se trouve derrière Vucic et l’OTAN et le mondialisme.

Ils ont tout le soutien et ils travaillent pour quiconque les paye. Mais à qui s’adresser si on n’accepte de travailler que pour son peuple ? Qui est le peuple ?

Le peuple c’est toi. Et tu es le seul auquel je peux m’adresser.

Dans l’ordinateur en panne est resté un brouillon d’un livre intitule « Après Vucic ». Dans ce livre j’explique comment on peut remplacer non seulement Vucic, mais aussi le dogme libéral-progressiste dont il dépend. Si cela n’est pas fait, après Vucic, nous aurons Vucic.

Si vous voulez que le livre soit publié, vous pouvez devenir donateur ou souscripteur en versant une somme au compte bancaire en Serbie ou en ligne sur la platforme Indiegogo.

Je sais que, comme nous, vous n’avez pas d’argent. Je sais que d’autres familles aussi font face au danger de finir à la rue. Je sais que des hommes meilleurs ont enduré des choses pires pour avoir travaillé pour le peuple. Je sais qu’il y a des besoins plus pressants.

Mais je sais aussi que seuls les peuples qui luttent pour la liberté peuvent être libres. Notre peuple serbe, même pendant les jours les plus sombres de l’esclavage Turc, avait les haïdouks, qui étaient capables « de parvenir, de s’évader, et d’endurer dans un endroit terrible », qui étaient prêts à lutter pour la liberté, contre l’empire. Mais même les haïdouks ne pouvaient pas exister sans soutien.

Je peux et je veux lutter. Je peux publier le livre avant les élections et contribuer à changer les choses. Mais sans soutien mes mains sont liées. Cette fois cela ne dépend pas de moi. C’est vous qui décidez si celle-ci est ma dernière annonce publique, ou si je viens juste de commencer.

Après avoir publié ce vidéo, je retournerai l’ordinateur emprunté et je resterai encore sans internet.

Vous m’aiderez en partageant cet appel. Vous m’aiderez en contribuant un centime.

Car chaque centime reçu de son peuple vaut plus que les millions des puissances étrangères.
story_txt:
Прикупио сам све!Можете и даље постати претплатници и приложници али кампања је остварена. Спасли сте ме.Click Here for English!        Cliquez ici pour le français !      Прочитај више на српском

Ја сам Андреј Фајгељ, дисидент. Због критике власти прети ми пет година затвора и избацивање породице на улицу. Са интернета су ме већ избацили и ово је моја последња шанса.
Хоћу да се борим. Али не могу без подршке. Помозите ми да повратим средства за рад и издам књигу, како бисмо барем замислили време "После Вучића".
Ако могућност плаћања преко Пеј Пала не ради
Уплатите директно са Пеј Пала на рачун fajgelj@gmail.com
Ако не плаћате преко интернета


-За динарске уплате из Србије:рачун: 160-5500100713374-64сврха уплате: прилог за књигупрималац: Андреј Фајгељ
-За девизне уплате из иностранства:BCITITMMIntesa Sanpaolo spaMilanoItaly
DBDBRSBGBanca Intesa ad BeogradMilentija Popovica 7b, 11070 Novi BeogradRepublic of Serbia
IBANRS35160553020045092072ANDREJ FAJGELJ

Српски

Како пролазе дисиденти у Србији?
Ја сам Андреј Фајгељ и усудио сам се да мислим својом главом.
Због тога сам прогресивно избациван из јавности. Из организација које сам оснивао, са пројеката које сам водио, из новина у којима сам објављивао најчитаније чланке а сада не смеју да ме објављују.
На крају ми је остало последње уточиште слободе, оно што би свако од нас требало да има, мој дом и мој простор на интернету. 
Кад сам имао шта да кажем, своје мишљење сам изразио у свом дому, својим речима, снимио на свом рачунару и објавио на свом блогу и својим друштвеним мрежама. Свој на своме. Никоме нисам куцао на врата. Али мени јесу покуцали на врата. 
У наш дом упале су специјалне полицијске снаге, одузеле моје рачунаре, одвеле ме пред мојом децом и стрпале ме у затвор.
Вучић је лагао: "Ни у једној земљи не би био пуштен. Ни у једној земљи на свету. Ни у једној земљи на свету. Дакле од Аргентине до Канаде, од Аустралије до Русије и скандинавских земаља, нигде никада не би био пуштен."
Писао сам амбасадама поменутих земаља, и другима, питајући да ли је истина да бих у њиховим земљама због критике Вучића и НАТО на Фејсбуку био ухапшен и никада не бих био пуштен. Нисам добио одговор.
Либерали су толики фолиранти. Нама овде тиранин може главе да сече. Док су њихови интереси заштићени, они ће бити задовољни. Вредности, демократија, људска права, слободе, с тим се они само исмевају.
Мени није смешно. И даље ми као државном непријатељу прети пет година затвора. Још увек ми не враћају рачунаре.
Покушао сам да се снађем. Купио сам на кредит неки лошији рачунар. Међутим и он се, под мистериозним околностима, покватио. Такође, мистериозно ми је оборен и блог. Мени је рачунар и средство за рад. Тако да ми је поред националног рада угрожен и професионални рад и постоји опасност да останем без посла.
Ако останем без посла, остаћу и без овог дома, и са четворо деце ћу завршити на улици.
Ето тако пролазе дисиденти у Србији. Врата затворена, руке везане, уста запушена, судбина запечаћена.
Да ја говорим само против Вучића, не бих имао проблема. Постоје многи опозиционари који имају и финансије и пролаз у медије и сваку другу подршку. Мој проблем је што говорим против либерално-прогресивне догме која стоји и иза Вучића и иза НАТО и иза глобализма.
Они имају сву подршку и они раде за оног ко их плаћа, а коме да се обратимо ми који пристајемо да радимо само за свој народ? Ко је народ?
Народ си ти. И ја само теби могу да се обратим.
У поквареном рачунару је остао нацрт књиге чији наслов је „После Вучића“. У тој књизи објашњавам како је могуће сменити не само Вучића већ и либерално-прогресивну догму која стоји иза њега. Уколико се то не уради, после Вучића долази Вучић.
Ако желиш да књига буде објављена, можеш бити приложник или претплатник. Уплатом одређених средстава на динарски рачун из Србије или онјлајн плаћањем на платформи Индигого.
Знам да немате новца као ни ми. Знам да се и друге породице налазе пред опасношћу да заврше на улици. Знам да су и бољи људи и горе пролазили радећи за народ. Знам да постоје и прече потребе.
Али исто тако знам да народ може бити слободан само ако се за слободу бори. Наш српски народ је и у најцрњим данима турског ропства имао хајдуке који су били кадри стићи, утећи, и на страшном месту постојати. Који су били спремни да се боре за слободу против империје. Али ни хајдуци нису могли без јатака.
Ја хоћу и могу да се борим. Могу да објавим књигу пре избора и утичем да се ствари промене. Али без подршке руке су ми везане. Овај пут се не питам ја. Ви ћете одлучили да ли је ово моја последња објава или сам тек почео.
Помоћи ћете ми ако проширите ову вест. Помоћи ћете ми ако уплатите један динар.
Јер сваки динар од свог народа вреди више од милиона од странаца.
English

What happens to dissidents in Serbia?
I am Andrej Fajgelj and I deared to think for myself.
For that, I was "progressively" banished from public life. From the organizations that I've founded, projects that I’ve led, from the newspapers I’ve written some of the most popular articles for and which
now don't dare to publish me.
In the end, all I was left with was the last refuge of freedom, which each of us should have, my home and my space on the Internet. When I had something to say, I voiced my opinion in my own home, in my own words, recorded it on my own computer and published it on my own blog and my own social network accounts. I knocked on no doors. But someone did knock on my door.
Our home was raided by special police forces, they seized my computers, arrested me in front of my children and put me in jail.
Vucic lied: "No other country would release him. No country in the world. No country in the world. From Argentina to Canada, from Australia to Russia and Scandinavian countries no one would never ever release him."
I wrote to the embassies of the countries mentioned, and others, asking if it was true that in their countries I would be arrested for criticizing Vucic and NATO on Facebook, never to be released. I got no answer.
Liberals are so fake! Here, the tyrant might as well cut off our heads. As long as their interests are protected, they will be satisfied. Values, democracy, human rights, freedoms, they are making fun of all that.
I don’t find that funny. As a public enemy, I am still facing five years in prison. They are still withholding my computers.
I tried to get along. I took out credit to buy a lower quality computer. But it broke down under mysterious circumstances. My blog mysteriously went down as well.
The computer is also my work equipment. Besides my public activity, my professional activity is at risk, and I'm in danger of losing my job. If I lose my job, I will lose my home, and end up homeless with four children.
This is what happens to dissidents in Serbia. Doors closed, hands tied, mouth closed, fate sealed.
If I spoke only against Vucic, I would have no problems. Many members of the opposition have finances and media coverage and all other support. My problem is that I am speaking against the liberal-progressive dogma that stands behind Vucic and behind NATO and behind globalism.
They have all the support and they work for those who are paying them, but to whom can we turn, we who agree only to work for our own people? Who is the people?
The people is you. You are the only one I can turn to.
In the broken computer, I had a draft of a book titled "After Vucic". In this book, I am explaining how it is possible to replace not only Vucic but also the liberal-progressive dogma that lies behind him. If this is not done, after Vucic, there will be Vucic.
If you want the book to be published, you can become a donor or a subscriber by paying into the Serbian bank account or online through Indiegogo.
I know that like us, you don’t have no money. I know that other families too are facing the danger of ending in the street. I know that better people have endured worse things for working for people. I know that there are more urgent needs.
But I also know that only the people fighting for freedom can be free. Even in the darkest days of the Ottoman occupation, our Serbian people had hajduks who were “able to accost, to evade and to endure on terrible place”. Who were willing to fight for freedom against the empire. But even hajduks couldn’t exist without support.
I want to fight and I can. I can publish the book before the elections and make a difference. But without support my hands are tied. It is not up to me this time. You will decide if this is my last announcement, or if I have just started.
You will help me if you share this news. You will help me if you donate one cent.
Because each cent from one’s own people is worth more than millions from foreign powers.

Français


Quel est le destin des dissidents en Serbie?
Je suis Andrej Fajgelj et j’ai osé penser librement.
A cause de cela, j’étais progressivement banni de la vie publique :

des organisations que j’ai fondées, des projets que j’ai menés, des journaux, pour lesquels j’écrivais des articles les plus lus et qui n’osent plus me publier.
Finalement, j’étais réduit au dernier refuge de la liberté, celui que nous devrions tous avoir, ma maison familiale, et mon espace sur internet.

Quand j’ai eu quelque chose à dire, j’ai exprimé mon opinion chez moi, avec mes propres mots, je l’ai enregistré sur mon ordinateur et publié sur mon blog et mes réseaux sociaux.

Soi-même chez soi. Je n’ai pas frappé à la porte de personne. Mais on a frappé à la mienne.
Notre maison a été perquisitionnée par les forces spéciales de la police,

ils ont saisi mes ordinateurs, m'ont arrêté devant mes enfants et m’ont mis en détention.
Vucic mentait: «En aucun pays il ne serait pas libéré. Aucun pays au monde. Aucun pays au monde.

De l’Argentine au Canada, de l’Australie à la Russie et aux pays scandinaves,

il ne serait libéré nulle part, jamais.
»
J’ai écrit aux ambassades des pays mentionnés, et aux autres,

en demandant s’il était vrai que dans leurs pays 


je serais arrêté pour avoir critiqué Vucic et l’OTAN sur Facebook, et je ne serais libéré jamais.

Je n’ai pas eu de réponse.
Quels hypocrites ces libéraux !

Ici, le tyran peut bien couper nos têtes.

Tant que leurs intérêts sont protégés, ils sont contents.

Valeurs, démocratie, droits de l’homme, libertés, ils s’en moquent de tout ça.
Ça ne me fait pas rigoler.

En tant qu’ennemi public, je risque toujours cinq ans de prison ferme.

Ils retiennent toujours mes ordinateurs.

J’ai essayé de me débrouiller. J’ai acheté un ordinateur moins performant à crédit. 

Mais il est tombé en panne dans des conditions mystérieuses.

Mon blog est aussi mystérieusement en panne.

Mon ordinateur est aussi un outil de travail.

En plus de l’activisme, mon activité professionnelle se trouve menacée aussi,

et le danger de perdre mon emploi est réel.

Si je perds mon emploi je perdrai ma maison,

et je finirai à la rue avec quatre enfants.

Tel est le destin des dissidents en Serbie.

Portes fermées, mains liées, bouche scotchée, sort scellé.
Si je ne parlais que contre Vucic, je n’aurais pas de problèmes.

De nombreux membres de l’opposition ont les finances

et la couverture médiatique et tout autre soutien.

Mon problème est de parler contre le dogme libéral-progressiste qui se trouve derrière Vucic et l’OTAN et le mondialisme.
Ils ont tout le soutien et ils travaillent pour quiconque les paye. Mais à qui s’adresser si on n’accepte de travailler que pour son peuple ?

Qui est le peuple ?
Le peuple c’est toi.

Et tu es le seul auquel je peux m’adresser.
Dans l’ordinateur en panne est resté un brouillon d’un livre intitule « Après Vucic ».

Dans ce livre j’explique comment on peut remplacer non seulement Vucic, 

mais aussi le dogme libéral-progressiste dont il dépend.

Si cela n’est pas fait, après Vucic, nous aurons Vucic.
Si vous voulez que le livre soit publié, vous pouvez devenir donateur ou souscripteur 

en versant une somme au compte bancaire en Serbie

ou en ligne sur la platforme Indiegogo.
Je sais que, comme nous, vous n’avez pas d’argent.

Je sais que d’autres familles aussi font face au danger de finir à la rue.

Je sais que des hommes meilleurs ont enduré des choses pires pour avoir travaillé pour le peuple.

Je sais qu’il y a des besoins plus pressants.
Mais je sais aussi que seuls les peuples qui luttent pour la liberté peuvent être libres. 

Notre peuple serbe, même pendant les jours les plus sombres de l’esclavage Turc, avait les haïdouks, 

qui étaient capables « de parvenir, de s’évader, et d’endurer dans un endroit terrible », qui étaient prêts à lutter pour la liberté, contre l’empire. 

Mais même les haïdouks ne pouvaient pas exister sans soutien.
Je peux et je veux lutter. Je peux publier le livre avant les élections et contribuer à changer les choses.

Mais sans soutien mes mains sont liées. 

Cette fois cela ne dépend pas de moi. C’est vous qui décidez si celle-ci est ma dernière annonce publique, ou si je viens juste de commencer.
Après avoir publié ce vidéo, je retournerai l’ordinateur emprunté et je resterai encore sans internet.
Vous m’aiderez en partageant cet appel.

Vous m’aiderez en contribuant un centime.
Car chaque centime reçu de son peuple vaut plus que les millions des puissances étrangères.

story:
Spider School

One day our daughter said she wanted to write a book called "Teacher Samantha's Spider School".  We asked her what the story was about and her reply was "Spider School is where bad spiders learn to be good spiders!".   We thought that was such a great idea that we helped her sketch it out over a few weeks and we put together this page so that she can earn the money to actually publish her story!

  • We really appreciate any support for our budding young author.
  • Vivi has either written, drawn, or approved every page of this book.
  • This book can help remind young children that some spiders are dangerous.

We appreciate any contribution you feel comfortable making and please enjoy the perks as we want this whole project to be fun for our little girl!

What We Need & What You Get

This is what the funds will be used for:

  • Fonts, background images, and illustrations needed.
  • Publishing of the actual 7 x 7 full color glossy book and shipping.
  • Marketing costs to promote Spider School.





The Impact

Teacher Samantha's Spider School - Malcolm Learns Manners is a great way to teach kids of all ages that some spiders are friendly and not to be feared, but that other spiders can be dangerous.  It is also a great way to teach manners since this first story focuses on the new spider student Malcolm.

  • Child friendly introduction to spiders and manners.
  • Vivi plans to read Spider School at the local library whenever possible.
  • Great way to support this 3 year old author on her first book!

Risks & Challenges

We will be self publishing the book through a small service.  Since it is a small run the books are a little expensive, so we apologize for the extra cost, but we will make sure that each copy is high quality.

  • We've made sure that we can make small runs of the book to reduce cost.
  • Vivi Lyra liked this process so much she is already working on her next book.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute money there are other ways you can help:

  • We would like to find partners to carry the book in their small local store.
  • Please share our link with your friends and family and help us spread the word!

Thank You very much for your time, we really appreciate it.

- The Blair Family

story:
What's this About?

Hello, my name is Tim Routledge. I recently self-published my first novel, Immortal. It's book 1 of The Archangel Series. I'm planning a six book series. It's been available for purchase on Amazon.com for a few months now. I've sold a little over 30 copies. I allowed the book to be free to download on Kindle over Memorial Day weekend and I sold over 180 free copies. 

The goal of this fundraiser is to reach a broader and bigger audience. With the copies I've sold thus far; they have gone to people within my connections. I'd like to be able to reach those I've never met, but who are very interested in the genre I love to write. 

Advertisements and promoting aren't cheap. Since I self-published, I have to do all the ads and promoting myself. I am a young man with a part-time job, I'd love to make novel writing my career. I know I can do it; but I know I need help. 

Where will the Money Go?

I know $3,500 is a lot of money, but it's the goal I've calculated after adding all the expenses.

  • $370 - Press Release. By purchasing this press release, my book will be featured on news outlets like New York Times, USA Today, etc.. It will also be easier to find on major search engines like Google, Yahoo, and Bing. It will be posted on over 250,000 PRWeb news subscribers as well as to over 30,000 journalists and bloggers. 
  • $300 - Advertisements on Amazon.com. I will divide these up into two categories. $200 for Amazon Kindle Ads which appear on the side of the screen and appear as suggestions. And $100 for Keyword Searches on Amazon which appear when you search for others like it. 
  • $200 - Social Media Ads. Facebook mainly. Boosting the book's fan page and its posts. 
  • $700 - Book Orders. I can't get my own copies for free, but I do get them at a discounted price. $700 for 100 copies of my paperback. I'm planning on doing a book signing at Half Price Books in Orland Park, Illinois. 
  • $1,100 - Merchandise. Custom merchandise. $850 for 6 custom Archangel rings. $200 for 10 custom Archangel war banners. $50 for 250 custom Immortal bookmarks. 
  • $640 - Extra Copies. I have a great chance to do a book tour in and around Chicago, Illinois and possibly Columbus, Ohio. With the remaining amount, I will order more paperback copies. 

What You Get!

Fundraising and promoting is no simple task. But with your help, we can achieve this together. Your donations will not go unnoticed. Each donor will receive a free PDF download of Immortal. I know it's not as exciting as a free copy, but as I've mentioned before; I can't get free copies. 

There will also be some specialty prizes for large donations, but will be kind of like how deferred pay works. If my goal isn't reached, the grand prize may not be granted, but you will get someone else really awesome. 

  • Each donation, no matter how large or small, will grant you a free PDF download of Immortal. 
  • The larger prizes that I mentioned are granted in exchange for larger donations. With a donation of $100 or more will grant you one of the limited Archangel Rings. But you'll have to hurry, they are limited.
  • If the goal isn't reached to achieve the Archangel Ring, you will instead be granted either one of the following: A free signed paperback copy of Immortal, an Archangel War Banner, or a meet and greet with myself. 
  • Please make sure you select one of the perks so that I can email the PDF download to you. 

Why You Should Donate?

I ran another fundraiser in order to have my book edited and published and even though that goal wasn't reached, I managed to find alternate ways to get both accomplished.

Immortal is a new and fresh story, one that hasn't been borrowed or re-imagined. I only have a few reviews on Amazon.com, but last I looked; I had three 5 star reviews and one 4 star review. I understand that's not a lot of reviews to back me up, but there are also no bad reviews either. 

I have a lot of faith in my writing. I know deep down that I can do this. I can be a full-time author. I want to show the world my imagination through words on pages. Allow them to enter the world I've created and live it alongside me. 

I believe in my writing and I believe in myself. When you read this book, you will not only fall in love with the characters, but you'll fall in love with the story. My hope is after you read this book and put it back on the shelf; your anticipation for the sequel will be as grand as your anticipation for Star Wars Episode 7 before it was released.  

What if I don't Reach the Goal?

If my goal is not reached, I will work to manage the advertisements and promoting another way. I did it before and I can do it again! 

Can't Donate? Help Me Share!

If you are not able to contribute, there are other ways you can help!

  • Share this page on social media sites like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, Pinterest, and YouTube.  
  • Tell your friends, your family, your co-workers, tell that random guy you always bump into at the store. Word of mouth is very efficient. 

Some of the fans submitted pictures with Immortal!




Check out my website for more information: http://timroutledge.com/
Thank you for your support!
story_txt:
What's this About? Hello, my name is Tim Routledge. I recently self-published my first novel, Immortal. It's book 1 of The Archangel Series. I'm planning a six book series. It's been available for purchase on Amazon.com for a few months now. I've sold a little over 30 copies. I allowed the book to be free to download on Kindle over Memorial Day weekend and I sold over 180 free copies. 
The goal of this fundraiser is to reach a broader and bigger audience. With the copies I've sold thus far; they have gone to people within my connections. I'd like to be able to reach those I've never met, but who are very interested in the genre I love to write. 
Advertisements and promoting aren't cheap. Since I self-published, I have to do all the ads and promoting myself. I am a young man with a part-time job, I'd love to make novel writing my career. I know I can do it; but I know I need help.    Where will the Money Go? I know $3,500 is a lot of money, but it's the goal I've calculated after adding all the expenses.  $370 - Press Release. By purchasing this press release, my book will be featured on news outlets like New York Times, USA Today, etc.. It will also be easier to find on major search engines like Google, Yahoo, and Bing. It will be posted on over 250,000 PRWeb news subscribers as well as to over 30,000 journalists and bloggers.  $300 - Advertisements on Amazon.com. I will divide these up into two categories. $200 for Amazon Kindle Ads which appear on the side of the screen and appear as suggestions. And $100 for Keyword Searches on Amazon which appear when you search for others like it.  $200 - Social Media Ads. Facebook mainly. Boosting the book's fan page and its posts. 
$700 - Book Orders. I can't get my own copies for free, but I do get them at a discounted price. $700 for 100 copies of my paperback. I'm planning on doing a book signing at Half Price Books in Orland Park, Illinois. 
$1,100 - Merchandise. Custom merchandise. $850 for 6 custom Archangel rings. $200 for 10 custom Archangel war banners. $50 for 250 custom Immortal bookmarks. 
$640 - Extra Copies. I have a great chance to do a book tour in and around Chicago, Illinois and possibly Columbus, Ohio. With the remaining amount, I will order more paperback copies.     What You Get! Fundraising and promoting is no simple task. But with your help, we can achieve this together. Your donations will not go unnoticed. Each donor will receive a free PDF download of Immortal. I know it's not as exciting as a free copy, but as I've mentioned before; I can't get free copies. 
There will also be some specialty prizes for large donations, but will be kind of like how deferred pay works. If my goal isn't reached, the grand prize may not be granted, but you will get someone else really awesome.   Each donation, no matter how large or small, will grant you a free PDF download of Immortal.  The larger prizes that I mentioned are granted in exchange for larger donations. With a donation of $100 or more will grant you one of the limited Archangel Rings. But you'll have to hurry, they are limited. If the goal isn't reached to achieve the Archangel Ring, you will instead be granted either one of the following: A free signed paperback copy of Immortal, an Archangel War Banner, or a meet and greet with myself. 

Please make sure you select one of the perks so that I can email the PDF download to you. 
    Why You Should Donate?  I ran another fundraiser in order to have my book edited and published and even though that goal wasn't reached, I managed to find alternate ways to get both accomplished.
Immortal is a new and fresh story, one that hasn't been borrowed or re-imagined. I only have a few reviews on Amazon.com, but last I looked; I had three 5 star reviews and one 4 star review. I understand that's not a lot of reviews to back me up, but there are also no bad reviews either. 
I have a lot of faith in my writing. I know deep down that I can do this. I can be a full-time author. I want to show the world my imagination through words on pages. Allow them to enter the world I've created and live it alongside me. 
I believe in my writing and I believe in myself. When you read this book, you will not only fall in love with the characters, but you'll fall in love with the story. My hope is after you read this book and put it back on the shelf; your anticipation for the sequel will be as grand as your anticipation for Star Wars Episode 7 before it was released.     What if I don't Reach the Goal?
If my goal is not reached, I will work to manage the advertisements and promoting another way. I did it before and I can do it again! 
Can't Donate? Help Me Share! If you are not able to contribute, there are other ways you can help!  Share this page on social media sites like Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, Pinterest, and YouTube.   Tell your friends, your family, your co-workers, tell that random guy you always bump into at the store. Word of mouth is very efficient.

Check out my website for more information: http://timroutledge.com/

Thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

     Recuerdos de Ixcan (link to facebook page) is a book of personal stories of people  who had settled in the jungle of Guatemala in the 1960's and '70's, forming the Cooperativa Ixcan Grande. They subsequently survived the years of violence that engulfed the area during Guatemala's civil war. The purpose of the book is to give voice to people who have been unable to express themselves publicly. The speakers in the book were, at that time, mothers, children, guerillas, community leaders, wives, and "ordinary" citizens.

     From 1972 to 1975 I (The author, Mike Sullivan) flew for an agrarian land reform project in Guatemala. The program, called Projecto Ixcan Grande, gave people enough land to support a family, freeing them from a life of migrant labor on large plantations. There were no roads in the area, hence the use of small planes. A guerilla movement arose in the late 1970's and the area of the Ixcan was caught up in a state of warfare and repression.

    Then the Guatemalan army came in, set up forts and began kidnapping local community leaders, teachers, catechists, etc. Denouncements to the press were not allowed in print. Complaints to the government and army were stonewalled. In desperation the Spanish Embassy in Guatemala City was occupied, hoping that this act would cause the international press to take notice. Some organizers, including interviewee "Chepe Salas" came from Ixcan. The government response was to burn down the embassy with the protesters and some Spanish diplomats inside.


What We Need & What You Get

  Recuerdos de Ixcan is a chance for the people to give voice. To tell their stories in their own words. Your donation helps make this happen.

The amount we are requesting is to cover the expenses of publication, publicity, associated fees, and distribution of the book. Any amount received over the stated goal will be seed money for a Spanish language version.  In the event that the entire goal is not reached, the amount we do receive will still go toward publication of the book. In addition any donor of $50.00 USD or more will receive a signed copy of Recuerdos de Ixcan.


The Impact:

  Recuerdos de Ixcan is a chance for the people to give voice. To tell their stories in their own words. Your donation helps make this happen.


Project/ author Background:

     I have been involved with the people of the Ixcan since 1972. I was there for two and a half years as a pilot during the initial settlement of the Cooperatives. In the late 1980's I produced a video about the people and the violence. In January of 1993 I accompanied the first organized return of refugees from Mexico to Guatemala. All of 1996, and the next three summers, were spent in the Ixcan, once again flying for the cooperative. The interviews presented in this book stem from three trips to Ixcan in 2010 and 2011. Photographer Tony O'Brien and myself published a book on children in Afghanistan titled Afghan Dreams (link to book on Amazon). 

The author, working as a pilot in the 70s

The author, Michael Sullivan, with Jesús Camposeco Ross

Other Ways You Can Help!

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!!!:

Please Please Please get out and spread the word about this campaign. Let people know about this wonderful project!!!


Don't forget to use Indiegogo share tools... Share within Indiegogo, facebook, twitter, instagram, etc...

story:
There's no doubt about it, we love music. Some people create it, others work with it, virtually everyone listens to it. It forms the very soundtrack to our lives.

But what makes a great piece of music? A catchy melody? Definitely. Killer lyrics? Possibly. But if you really want to uncover the X-Factor that helped Mark Ronson shift 14 million copies of Uptown Funk, it's essential to understand how we experience music.

I'm Dr. Geoff Luck, and for 20 years I've studied the neurological, physiological and behavioural effects of music. I've discovered that music we desire stimulates our mind, captures our heart and seduces our body in ways we find irresistible.  

In The X-Factor in Music Uncovered, I introduce the science behind the experience, and reveal the anatomy of the world's favourite music. For a taste of what's in the book, check out my blog.

What can you learn from this book?

My goal is to help music fans connect more profoundly with the music they love, show music creators how they can write more successful music, and help music professionals create more engaging experiences. If music plays a significant role in your life, this book is for you.

Music fans

Whether you listen at home, at the gym, or in your car, The X-Factor in Music Uncovered reveals the incredible ways your favourite music keeps you listening again and again.

Music creators

If you’re a composer, songwriter, artist or producer, The X-Factor in Music Uncovered will help you write more engaging music more likely to succeed in a competitive marketplace.

Music professionals

If you work with music (such as in radio, streaming, film, TV, music supervision, video games, sports, marketing or branding), The X-Factor in Music Uncovered reveals how to create musical experiences with maximum impact.

It's also the perfect companion for anyone who studies or works with music therapy, education or research since it provides an accessible introduction to the neurological, physiological and behavioural effects of music.

What's so special about it?

From radio to playlists to movies and marketing, music is everywhere. And every year, hundreds of scientific studies on music are published. Yet these studies remain largely inaccessible to the population at large. In The X-Factor in Music Uncovered, I take this research and apply it to music you're sure to be familiar with, opening it up to a larger audience. This makes The X-Factor in Music Uncovered a one-of-a-kind resource.

When will it be ready?

The first draft of the entire book is complete. Chapter 1 provides a framework for the X-Factor by examining the ubiquity and functions of music in everyday life, previous attempts at characterising elements of successful music, and my innovative new approach to this endeavour. Chapters 2, 3, and 4 explore how extraordinary music stimulates your mind, from manipulating brain chemistry to creating understanding and eliciting powerful, higher-order emotions. Chapters 5, 6, and 7 examine how breathtaking music captures your heart, from generating peak experiences to increasing preference and intensifying social bonds. Chapters 8, 9, and 10 investigate how exceptional music seduces your body, from entraining visceral rhythms to stimulating active engagement and unlocking potential. Finally, chapter 11 sets out a blueprint for the X-Factor.

I'll spend the summer revising and editing the manuscript ready for printing and shipping in the Autumn. Expected delivery date is November 2016, just in time to slip into your favourite music lover's Christmas stocking *<|:o{>

What about funding and perks?

My funding target is €10,000. This is a Flexible campaign, so contributors will receive their perks regardless of whether or not the target is met. Funding will be used to cover professional editing, cover design, ISBN, publication and printing of The X-Factor in Music Uncovered. Contributors can select from a range of awesome perks, including: 

  • The X-Factor in Music Uncovered in a range of formats.
  • Bespoke song/composition analysis and Skype time.
  • Exclusive workshops offering an interactive, in-depth experience to help you get the most out of everything crammed into the book. 

How can you contribute?

Simple. Select a perk that's right for you, then spread the word!

Know an avid music fan? A songwriter, perhaps? Maybe a friend who studies or works with music? Help them discover how to intensify their listening experience, write more engaging music or create more impactful musical experiences by telling them about the campaign! 

However you contribute, discover what separates the best from the rest with The X-Factor in Music Uncovered. More than just a book, it will profoundly connect you with the soundtrack to your life..

story:
Hi we're back (yes us again) seeking more backing from our followers! After the success of our first and second campaigns, where we raised enough money to get a new shiny new website (THANK YOU :D), we're here again to ask and plead for your help! Don't make me beg anymore my knees are getting dirty!

As you know Skatronixxx.com is the number one website for all your nerdy reviews and news. Although the site is now no longer being run at a loss to @skatronixxx (YAY), there is still much more we would like to do, to keep you our fans entertained.

BUT...

We'd like to offer you something in return, unlike those other sites out there that ask for donations in return to keep thier site going but don't offer anything back. We're different! We like our followers, we don't see them as wallets we'll gladly promote them in return! Don't believe me? Check out this video below:-

https://www.youtube.com/embed/AQzI5NFBrKQ

Our website was created by fans like you, FOR YOU! Help keep us going from strength to strength and boost your own profile in return after all, fars fair :)

So you may be thinking, why are you still fund raising even though you made enough money for a new site? What more could you want? The answer is simple. WE WANT YOU TO:-

  • Help us shape the future of our site
  • Offer un-noticed writers the chance to show thier skills to a wider audience and follow thier dreams
  • Help promote blogging AND vlogging

We can't do this without you. Through our next fund raising campaign we are looking to:-

  • Attend conventions,
  • Promote the site 
  • Attract budding writers to come join us and learn writing and html skills for FREE

What's more we love our fans and we want to offer something in return. So rather than asking for handouts if you support us, we'll support you!

story:
Essentially,

i'm a black queer writer & artist & teacher, who has recently moved to Detroit to more sustainably continue my work combining creative arts & community organizing. 

  • I need a financial jumpstart as I take roots in the Detroit area. 
  • Over the last six months I have begun collaborating on long-term projects to create Black art spaces in the Detroit-area & joined Arts.Black -- a Black Art critique platform based in Detroit. 
  • I am applying for artist / writing residences to improve my craft & become a better facilitator.

What I Need & What You Get

I'm looking for community support as I cover early moving costs & nesting fees:

  • Housing & Food Costs -- $800 (includes two months of rent + food costs) 
  • Travel + Moving Costs  -- $500 (storing the last bit of my life in Boston, got it get it over) 
  • Application Fees -- $300 (applying to residencies /book prizes over the next six months)

Now I'm not just going to ask your for things for FREE! If you donate you can receive: 

  • Digital Chapbooks 
  • Postcards 
  • One-on-One Poetry Editing Session / Workshops 
  • Online Group Workshops 

The Impact

Your contribution will support my work which commits to: 

  • Find sustainable ways to protect, amplify, build Black futures for all Black folks. 
  • Offer intentional & meaningful contributions to the Detroit creative community. 
  • Imagine new language for resisitence & progress. 

Risks & Challenges

There is a huge risk in crowd-sourcing such a significant change. I am being transparent about my need & hope those in the community who can will support my work. I also know many of the folks I make my work for cannot afford to donate, so I am most definitely looking for other means of survival.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Book me for Poetry Readings / Workshops / Editing! 
  • Also please share on your favorite social media platform!
