story:
Ethical Style Journal, a biannual sustainable fashion magazine.

"We started Ethical Style Journal almost a year and a half ago, and the rallying behind this much-needed sustainable fashion platform has been encouraging. We started out very small, producing a digital edition with the help of generous, small fashion brands and contributors, plus our loyal readers...mostly women who had been waiting for something like ESJ to come along. Our readership means everything to us, and is one of the reasons why we don't give up, no matter how challenging the world of publishing becomes. 

We're now ready to take the next step in offering you the option to purchase annual print and/or digital subscriptions for our 2018 issues; Spring/Summer and Fall/Winter. We thought it best to use this platform as a way to get the healthy quantity we'd need to commit to printing long term. It's a really exciting time and I hope you'll join the hundreds of readers who have come to love Ethical Style Journal."

Katie, founder & editor-in-chief

 

Production, Publishing, Printing, and Perks

Our total goal will fund the production and circulation of this year's issues. This includes content creation in the form of photo shoots and articles by contributing writers; design and layout by our art director; digital publishing and hosting through Publitas; and printing of a healthy quantity of magazines on post-consumer and recycled paper, with vegetable-based and non-toxic ink.

Production:

With every issue, we strive to give you an experience that's worth your investment. We're excited to start this year off with our Spring/Summer 2018 issue, which will fuse art and activism. We're working with several artists and activists to bring this idea to life in a way that's awe-inspiring and moving. So far, we've scheduled three editorial shoots, featuring nine models and nearly a dozen different sustainable fashion brands.

And as always, our visionary art director and designer, Brittany Loar, is ready to create another beautiful edition that you'll not only want to keep forever, but never put down.

Publishing:

Publitas will be publishing and hosting this year's digital editions. We love the presentation and functionality the online publisher provides our digital subscribers.

Printing: 

We're always exploring sustainable printing options so that we can produce a high-quality, eco-friendly magazine that's affordable for us as well as our readers. When we order a larger quantity, the price per issue decreases and printing becomes more affordable. Succeeding with this campaign will allow us to print at a quantity that makes more financial sense, while giving you the option to buy an annual subscription.

In the past, we've worked with California-based Greenerprinter. We are now considering other sustainable printers, including Rolling Press, a family-owned print house based in Brooklyn, New York.

Perks: 

In addition to having your choice of subscriptions for our 2018 issues, we have a few extra perks to offer. Axiology is a vegan, natural, and palm-oil free lipstick brand that we've had the pleasure of featuring in recent issues. We have a limited quantity of their Bad lipstick shade (a deep brown that looks beautiful on everyone) available to include with our annual print and digital subscription.

And if you want styles straight from the pages of Ethical Style Journal, we also have a few really beautiful, high-fashion pieces, featured in our Fall/Winter 2017 issue, available as premium perks.

The Impact

As a magazine focused on ethical and sustainable fashion, we're doing our part to shape fashion culture into one that is as much about awareness as style. As a supporter of Ethical Style Journal, you are part of this. By subscribing to our magazine, you provide us with the means to continue to expand upon and change the fashion industry for the better, and in turn, create a more compassionate, inclusive, equal, and just world.

Below are our values, so you can see how they align with your own.

We Value:

  • Ethics—fair and equal pay for garment workers, and safe working conditions for them as well. We value people over profit.
  • Sustainability—industry processes that are less wasteful and hazardous to people, the planet, and animals. We value environmental consciousness as a principle in the creation of fashion.
  • Transparency—to know who, what, and how our dollars impact. We value the informed decisions we're allowed to make when we know.
  • Animal life—innovation and creativity has allowed us to welcome cruelty free fashion. We value new fashion free of animal products or byproducts, and free of conflict in the way of deforestation, habitat loss, etc.
  • Dialogue and action—to improve humankind, particularly dialogue and action that has influence on creating healthier job and living opportunities, and promotes equality for people of color, globally.

We believe in progress over perfection, and we're thrilled to present you with fashion and stories that will guide us to better times.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge that we have faced and continue to face is budgeting time and money. It takes tremendous resources to bring a fashion magazine to life, from building relationships with brands, sourcing clothing, scouting locations, and scheduling shoots, to funding layout and printing. With a very small team doing the work of entire staffs of people, and only a fraction of the resources, we each feel the pressure to produce great content in a timely and budget-friendly manner.

Additionally, growing our readership in an age of free content and in an increasingly digital world, will always be a challenge. We plan to address all of this by continuing to build a personal relationship with our audience, and by creating and growing in a way that will provide an experience that's unique and worth investing in. We'll keep going until we have nothing left to give.

We believe this spirit is what will sustain our fashion magazine.

Other Ways You Can Help

We love it when people share our projects. Feel free to share anything we do or say on social media. Share this project with someone you think would love our magazine, by using the Indiegogo share tools. And finally, please follow us on social media. These things really matter to us! :)

It takes tremendous resources to bring a fashion magazine to life, from building relationships with brands, sourcing clothing, scouting locations, and scheduling shoots, to funding layout and printing. With a very small team doing the work of entire staffs of people, and only a fraction of the resources, we each feel the pressure to produce great content in a timely and budget-friendly manner.
Additionally, growing our readership in an age of free content and in an increasingly digital world, will always be a challenge. We plan to address all of this by continuing to build a personal relationship with our audience, and by creating and growing in a way that will provide an experience that's unique and worth investing in. We'll keep going until we have nothing left to give.
We believe this spirit is what will sustain our fashion magazine.

Other Ways You Can Help
We love it when people share our projects. Feel free to share anything we do or say on social media. Share this project with someone you think would love our magazine, by using the Indiegogo share tools. And finally, please follow us on social media. These things really matter to us! :)

story:
Hello! I’m Kosa Ely and I’m Radhe Gendron.

    

We're happy to meet you and we appreciate you being here. We are the creators of The Jaguar’s Story book, Audio book and Activity book.

We are both moms, animal lovers, and environmentalists. We believe we can touch lives and make a positive difference in the world with awesome art and children's books.

Kosa is the director of Chandra Media, an art and media educational nonprofit, and this is her third book for children.

Radhe is a trained and accomplished artist. The Jaguar’s Story is Radhe’s debut children’s book!

Half of the funds we need for printing The Jaguar’s Story ($10K) has already been raised through sponsors and donors. With your help we can raise the rest by selling hundreds (perhaps thousands) of Jaguar Story books while igniting a grassroots movement to protect jaguars and the future of the Amazon.

 

  • 48 full-color pages
  • Large format 10 x 11 inches (25 x 28 cm)
  • High quality offset printing
  • Hardbound with stitched binding and wrapped in a stunning dust jacket
  • Manufactured ecologically in Canada
  • Printed on FSC* paper using non-toxic vegetable inks

*Forest Stewardship Council certified forest products are responsibly sourced ecologically, environmentally, and socially.

Eight pages of fun facts about jaguars and Amazon flora and fauna, with a matching game. Learn about jaguars and dozens of other animals, reptiles and insects who live in the Amazon. Find out about their families, their food, and how they survive.

How many monkeys, snakes, frogs, caiman, butterflies and birds can you find in the story?

 

The Jaguar’s Story audio book is narrated by the author and accompanied by an exotic rainforest soundtrack and original music. The audio book is entertaining on it's own, and helpful for children learning to read. You will receive an online link or a download card of the audio book.

Radhe is creating The Jaguar’s Story Activity book as an extra fun perk for the kids. Children will get to draw rosettes on a jaguar, color rainforest scenery, and help a lost cub find his way home. It will be available as a soft-bound book, 8 x 10 inches (20 x 25 cm) and as a pdf file you can download and print.

Radhe’s exquisite jaguar paintings will be available as quality prints on art paper and as hand signed quality giclees.

You may sponsor books for schools, sponsor an author visit, or be a business sponsor. You may also sponsor a Spanish edition or a Portuguese edition. Your gift is tax-deductible.

Chandra Media is a registered educational non-profit 501(c)(3).  Sponsorships and donations are tax-deductible. Your employer may match your contribution. Please contact us for more details.

Stretch Goal $20,000.

Help us create phase one of our interactive website for children, parents, and teachers.

The website will offer fun activities for children, lesson plans for teachers, and great info and resources for all ages. Become an advocate for the rainforest, “adopt a jaguar” and find sustainably produced rainforest goods and charities worth supporting.

 

Kosa Ely
Author & Project Manager
Director of Chandra Media
 

Radhe Gendron
Artist

 
Krishna Sanchez
Filmmaker & Voice Actor
 		 Bada Haridas
Audio Book Producer
 
Govinda Cordua
Graphic Artist
Pranada Comtois
Printing and Business Consultant		 Raghu Consbruck
Design Consultant

 

Kosa Ely's The Jaguar's Story is a spell-binding story of the very real challenges faced by jaguars living in the Amazon. The language is beautiful in its simplicity, and the story is brought to life by Radhe Gendron's vivid and captivating illustrations. Though this book is subtly educational, I was enthralled by the quality of storytelling. On par with stories like The Lion King, children of all ages will LOVE reading this book again and again.

—David Estes, book-loving dad and bestselling children's and YA author

Another beautiful gift to our world from Kosa Ely. Let’s save jaguars and other rainforest animals from extinction. Let’s do it.      

—John Robbins, bestselling author and founder of EarthSave International

What a gorgeous way to educate children and bring awareness to all of us about the importance of jaguars and their habitat. The story is engaging, the art stunning, and the message long overdue. Every home, school, and library ought to have this lovely book in their collection. 

—Diamantina Navarro, Librarian

It's a pleasure to read Kosa Ely's The Jaguar's Story and to be drawn emotionally into the struggle to preserve the rainforest and its creatures. Readers not only learn about the problem of habitat destruction and endangered species, but also grow in empathy and concern. Both the storytelling and illustrations are superb, and they stay with readers long after the book is closed. The Jaguar's Story should be a curriculum resource in every elementary unit on science and geography, as well as being an excellent addition to any home library. It's a great treasure.

—Dr. Edith Best, author, educator, school administrator

A mother jaguar leads her cubs on a perilous journey to safety from the dangers of their shrinking habitat. On the way to their new faraway home, the playful cubs witness the destruction of their natural environment and learn skills of survival. A sigh of relief is felt when they succeed in finding their promised land, but will it be safe for long?

—David Shapiro, Screenwriter and Film Producer

 

Risks are low. Our experienced team has collectively produced hundreds of beautiful full-color books and albums. The Jaguar’s Story book is professionally written, edited, illustrated, and designed. We're ready to go to press. The audio book is professionally produced and ready for release. The Activity book will be completed before the campaign is over.  

Your wait will be minimal. Delays can occur at the printing house, or during shipping or fulfillment. If we encounter any delay we’ll be sure to let you know.

We would love to see this video circle the globe and be viewed by millions. With your help it’s possible. Please use these buttons to share with as many people as you like, as often as you want. Every time you share this campaign with a friend or with your community, you help raise awareness.

Your support and generosity means the world to us! Thank you so much!

story:
“You shall be free indeed when your days are not without a care, nor your nights without a want and a grief, but rather when these things girdle your life and yet you rise above them naked and unbound.”

― Kahlil Gibran, The Prophet

 

Hello, I’m Kris Seraphine-Oster, PH.D!

I’m an author, brand strategist and marketing copywriter who teaches creative, spiritually-inclined entrepreneurs how to bring in more clients, customers and prosperity.

I’m here to revolutionize the feminine face of business.

Once upon a time, I was a corporate marketing director and lead website developer for some pretty big names, including Citrix Online, E! Entertainment Television, Disney, ABC, Paramount Pictures.

While working full time and raising a gorgeous daughter, I attended Pacifica Graduate Institute to study mythology and depth psychology with such luminaries as Marion Woodman and James Hillman. With Ph.D. in hand, I began my quest to create a business that would uplift other entrepreneurs and trail blazers.

Through my book UNBOUND, you will walk away knowing how to weave your own sensual spell and reawaken enchantment in your life and business.

This may all sound like fluffy fantasy or fairytale, but I’ve done this for myself by following specific “pleasure power” practices the past six years.

UNBOUND is first and foremost grounded in the authority of your own sensate experience. It takes into account your spiritual self-sovereignty.

There is only one version of the YOU living in this body, in this lifetime.

After reading UNBOUND you will clearly identify your natural passions, accept your desires and follow your dreams so that you live a life that is prosperous, generous, love-based and pleasure-soaked.

“How can I be like you? How can I have a life like [insert your favorite celebrity/athlete/author/etc here]?”

The answer is simple. BE in your body.

Pleasure is the most powerful form of presence in the world. Treat yourself as a sacred being and you will create and live from your heart and your creative source, which is namely your pleasure zone.

Being in your pleasure zone while you are doing anything brings out your natural genius and gifts.

 

“Will this book help me figure out what my brand/personal myth really is about?”

YES!

My mission is to help you find your unique voice and story, and then embody it through the most delicious and adventurous life you can dream up! You aren’t just alive to bring home a paycheck.

You are meant for so much more … to be so much more.

 

“Can I take what I learn and then teach the material in Unbound to my own community?”

Affirmative.

My intention in creating the worldwide Unbound Circle is to give you the tools to bring to life the teachings and concepts of the book Unbound so you can provide them for the benefit of your own community. 

What you pay for when you contribute to an Unbound Circle perk:

  • 9-week training and certification course with me; 
  • pdf workbooks and all digital files;
  • printed binder for coach/leader;
  • 2 printed, spiral bound workbooks for your coaching clients and students (additional workbooks may be purchased separately in February 2019);
  • licensing to use the materials in your own coaching practice or course curriculum FOREVER.

All other folks who purchase the licensing for the Unbound Circle will have to pay quarterly to continue to use the program and the assets.

Whether you’re inspiring a small circle of good friends and entrepreneurs or leading a large online group, the Unbound Circle will provide an impactful, transformative 9-week curriculum you can easily plug into your own teaching and/or coaching programs.

 

My first book Return to Enchantment: Your Guide to Creating a Magical Livelihood was published in 2015 to rave reviews and hit the top 20 list of best sellers on Amazon in the Women, Small Business category!

Thank you for supporting me in my last Indiegogo campaign for Return to Enchantment. I get so many emails thanking me for this book because it truly is a balm for the feminine soul!

Women want to be sovereign, savvy and wildly prosperous in their businesses, yet often the world tells them that they need to be like MEN to achieve their dreams.

Men and women are different and have different needs and ways of moving through the world. 

Plus, so many men tell me that wish to find the FACE OF THE FEMININE in their own industries too! It's not just the women who are wounded by our hyper-masculinized cultural values ... the men are too.

UNBOUND: An Aphrodisiac to Unleash Magical Passion in Your Life and Work​ is poised to go even wider and deeper than my first book. 

I appreciate your time, your encouragement and LOVE reviewing my campaign.

Deep, deep bows of gratitude,

Kris


What I Need & What You Get

I'm raising $10,000 to cover the costs of the book editing, formatting (print, eBook formats) audio/spoken word version, cover design as well as the creation of the materials for the Unbound Circle  (video classes, audio meditations and classes, pdf and printed workbooks) that will accompany the release of the book.

 

The Unbound Circle will have it's own home on the internet and include worksheets, video instruction and a private Facebook group to help participants connect to one another in their parts of the world.

I'm working on the second draft of UNBOUND right now and plan to write a third draft to be completed by mid-November.

Everyone that contributes to my campaign will get a sample chapter, or two, at the end of October 2018 so they can get a taste of the deliciousness to come. Exciting, YES?!!
 

MORE ABOUT UNBOUND, THE BOOK.

This book will help you:

  • Take ownership of your story. You are the author of your reality.
  • Discover the themes and plots working behind the scenes-these are generally unconscious materials that contribute to your beliefs and values.
  • Create maps to visually see who you are becoming.
  • Begin to align your true passions and life path with your day-to-day choices in your livelihood and relationships.
  • Program new identity to incorporate and sustain the changes.
  • Stay present in your body during times of high-pressure and stress.
  • Learn life strategies to stay "turned on" and pleasured throughout your day.
  • Practice pleasure on a daily basis so you can be more creative, innovative and productive at work. 

TABLE OF CONTENTS

A BODY OF WISDOM : 

Become the pleasure you wish to see in the world.

  • An Invitation
  • Aligning to Pleasure
  • The Heart of the Matter
  • Enchanted Chemistry

PLEASURE YOURSELF FIRST :

When the senses are pleasured, creativity and innovation flow with ease. You will learn essential pleasure practices to turn on your life + work.

  • Sight
  • Sound
  • Taste
  • Smell
  • Touch
  • Imagination + Intuition

BREAK THE CHAINS :

Rewrite your life story to create lasting change.

  • Who Are You Becoming?
  • Embody Your Pleasure Superpowers
  • Speaking Your Truth
  • Re-Riting Your Stories
  • Create or Join an Unbound Circle

TURN ON YOUR LIFE :

Three goddesses came forward and presented themselves to me as embodied ways of knowing and experiencing pleasure. In these chapters I explore the mythic, imaginative and spiritual power represented by these potent deities. They reveal to us the mysteries of sacred pleasure that are invisible to the eye and felt by the heart.

  • Lila: Play, Creativity
  • Lilith: Sex, Life Force Energy
  • Aphrodite: Pleasure, Power

TURN ON YOUR BUSINESS :

How to create ecstatic success on your own terms.

  • Be The CEO of Pleasure: Mindset + Inner Work
  • Business Tantra: The Alchemy of Masculine + Feminine
  • Pleasure Audit: Find Out What’s Working in Your Business + What’s Not
  • Breathtaking: Create Moan-Worthy Content
  • Toast of the Town: Plan Your Coming Out Party
  • A Sexy + Seductive Business Plan

 

Unbound will be rolled out to all contributors of the Indiegogo campaign first.

 

MORE ABOUT THE UNBOUND CIRCLE LICENSING PROGRAM

The training will take 9 weeks to complete and at the outset of the program you will get bi-weekly meetings with me (some live and some pre-recorded) to help you launch the UNBOUND CIRCLE in your own community or your own work.

You will have my support with:

  • All teaching and coaching materials to create your own circle or to incorporate into your coaching practice.
  • Templated marketing materials to use to promote your individual or group coaching.
  • I will provide one basic social media/newsletter style banner that you can customize with your own name and dates.
  • I will give you my template for copywriting your sales page and email announcement.
  • I will not provide “hands on” services to implement the creation of marketing materials. I can give you a list of my recommended service providers.
  • For the first 6 months (February 2019 - August 2019) you can contact me via email with coaching questions

The first 9 weeks will be a fertile training ground as you go through each of the three cycles and work with your own materials. After this training period you are encouraged to begin using Unbound in your coaching and courses.

I suggest that you jump in right away because I will be available to you for support without my extra 1-1 fees. After August 2019 you are still welcome to coach with me for $75/hour.

The Unbound Cycle “voices” comes from three goddesses:

  1. Lila = play, creativity
  2. Lilith = sex, life force
  3. Aphrodite and Venus = pleasure; the glue that joins the three worlds in Unbound.

I did not choose these goddesses. Rather they stepped forward for me as three unique presences who wish to guide and teach humanity.

I believe they came to me because all three goddesses represent powerful, dynamic forces of soul activation and agency.

Unbound is about redefining your life purpose using the power of your imagination, working in three life areas:

work = play = Lila

life force energy = sex = Lilith

pleasure = power = Aphrodite

Pleasure is the power that transforms us. We all have powerful magic within us to create a life of meaning, deep Abiding Love, pleasure and prosperity.

Each cycle is explored through mythology, astrology, tarot symbology, archetypal psychology, and esoteric magical practices.

A cycle includes 7 lessons and the estimated time needed to complete each is 3 weeks.

At the completion of a cycle, you will take a short assessment that is comprised of short essay questions and a creative project.

Once the assessment and creative project are complete the next cycle will be unlocked.

After the completion of all three cycles you will be awarded a certificate of completion and will have full access to the marketing and teaching tools you’ll need to integrate Unbound into your coaching or online teaching business.

The objective of Unbound Circle is to have an intimate and safe place to explore these three spheres of influence with like-minded individuals who also want to go DEEP.

Deep into the meaning of their your influence in the world.

During the 9-week study where you reflect on your own alchemical make up and are ready to bring out your magical essence into the world, you can bring my work into your community and share the materials (curriculum, worksheets and video content).

Be a leader and teach others the Unbound approach to creating a life that feels soaked through and through with pleasure, power and magic.

Part 1: The LILA Cycle

  • What is PLAY?
  • What do you want to CREATE?
  • How does the creative energy flow through you in the most natural way?
  • Theme words: Spontaneity, Games, Innovation, Reinvention

Part 2: The LILITH Cycle

  • How do you want to express your SEXUALITY?
  • What are you repressing? (SHADOW self)
  • What is LIFE-FORCE Energy?
  • How does life-force energy flow through you + how can you magnify it?
  • What is the TRANSFORMATION you are seeking?
  • Theme words: Sex Magic, Tantra, Shadow, Transformation, Death/Rebirth

Part 3: The APHRODITE Cycle

  • What do you WANT?
  • What are your desires?
  • How does PLEASURE work in your life?
  • How can you be your truest, most RAW self?
  • Are you claiming your space and beauty?
  • What makes you feel most POWERFUL?
  • Theme words: Pleasure, Art, Power, Beauty, Desire, Delight, Sensuality, Original Self.

I am here as a guide, but I wrote this program so you could feel connected to your own power to recreate your life according to your vision.

Right now there is a a lot of fear and despondency on the planet and so many need guidance to remain in the light. You can help others through the information in this book. But of course, you must take care of yourself first. Love yourself first. And fill yourself with so much love and power and Magic so that you have an overflow to give to others.

The Unbound circle is designed to give you the materials necessary to guide your own Circle and help increase Joy on the planet.

You can make a difference by first diving into this work for yourself.

All three of these magical forces have been domesticated, chained and controlled in our patriarchal dominated psyches. But really? These forces are not to be contained.

They also represent the Dark Feminine, Rebellion. Subversion.

Methods used in the UNBOUND CIRCLE curriculum:

  • Writing
  • Imagining/Imaging/Visioning
  • Meditation
  • Movement
  • Planning
  • Practicing Ritual
  • Creative Project: Art/Dance/Music/Theatre

Enchanted Chemistry
PLEASURE YOURSELF FIRST :When the senses are pleasured, creativity and innovation flow with ease. You will learn essential pleasure practices to turn on your life + work.
Sight
Sound
Taste
Smell
Touch
Imagination + Intuition
BREAK THE CHAINS :Rewrite your life story to create lasting change.
Who Are You Becoming?
Embody Your Pleasure Superpowers
Speaking Your Truth
Re-Riting Your Stories
Create or Join an Unbound Circle
TURN ON YOUR LIFE :Three goddesses came forward and presented themselves to me as embodied ways of knowing and experiencing pleasure. In these chapters I explore the mythic, imaginative and spiritual power represented by these potent deities. They reveal to us the mysteries of sacred pleasure that are invisible to the eye and felt by the heart.
Lila: Play, Creativity
Lilith: Sex, Life Force Energy
Aphrodite: Pleasure, Power
TURN ON YOUR BUSINESS :How to create ecstatic success on your own terms.
Be The CEO of Pleasure: Mindset + Inner Work
Business Tantra: The Alchemy of Masculine + Feminine
Pleasure Audit: Find Out What’s Working in Your Business + What’s Not
Breathtaking: Create Moan-Worthy Content
Toast of the Town: Plan Your Coming Out Party
A Sexy + Seductive Business Plan
 Unbound will be rolled out to all contributors of the Indiegogo campaign first. MORE ABOUT THE UNBOUND CIRCLE LICENSING PROGRAMThe training will take 9 weeks to complete and at the outset of the program you will get bi-weekly meetings with me (some live and some pre-recorded) to help you launch the UNBOUND CIRCLE in your own community or your own work.You will have my support with:
All teaching and coaching materials to create your own circle or to incorporate into your coaching practice.
Templated marketing materials to use to promote your individual or group coaching.
I will provide one basic social media/newsletter style banner that you can customize with your own name and dates.
I will give you my template for copywriting your sales page and email announcement.
I will not provide “hands on” services to implement the creation of marketing materials. I can give you a list of my recommended service providers.
For the first 6 months (February 2019 - August 2019) you can contact me via email with coaching questions
The first 9 weeks will be a fertile training ground as you go through each of the three cycles and work with your own materials. After this training period you are encouraged to begin using Unbound in your coaching and courses.I suggest that you jump in right away because I will be available to you for support without my extra 1-1 fees. After August 2019 you are still welcome to coach with me for $75/hour.The Unbound Cycle “voices” comes from three goddesses:
Lila = play, creativity
Lilith = sex, life force
Aphrodite and Venus = pleasure; the glue that joins the three worlds in Unbound.
I did not choose these goddesses. Rather they stepped forward for me as three unique presences who wish to guide and teach humanity.I believe they came to me because all three goddesses represent powerful, dynamic forces of soul activation and agency.Unbound is about redefining your life purpose using the power of your imagination, working in three life areas:work = play = Lilalife force energy = sex = Lilithpleasure = power = AphroditePleasure is the power that transforms us. We all have powerful magic within us to create a life of meaning, deep Abiding Love, pleasure and prosperity.Each cycle is explored through mythology, astrology, tarot symbology, archetypal psychology, and esoteric magical practices.A cycle includes 7 lessons and the estimated time needed to complete each is 3 weeks.At the completion of a cycle, you will take a short assessment that is comprised of short essay questions and a creative project.Once the assessment and creative project are complete the next cycle will be unlocked.After the completion of all three cycles you will be awarded a certificate of completion and will have full access to the marketing and teaching tools you’ll need to integrate Unbound into your coaching or online teaching business.The objective of Unbound Circle is to have an intimate and safe place to explore these three spheres of influence with like-minded individuals who also want to go DEEP.Deep into the meaning of their your influence in the world.During the 9-week study where you reflect on your own alchemical make up and are ready to bring out your magical essence into the world, you can bring my work into your community and share the materials (curriculum, worksheets and video content).Be a leader and teach others the Unbound approach to creating a life that feels soaked through and through with pleasure, power and magic.Part 1: The LILA Cycle
What is PLAY?
What do you want to CREATE?
How does the creative energy flow through you in the most natural way?
Theme words: Spontaneity, Games, Innovation, Reinvention
Part 2: The LILITH Cycle
How do you want to express your SEXUALITY?
What are you repressing? (SHADOW self)
What is LIFE-FORCE Energy?
How does life-force energy flow through you + how can you magnify it?
What is the TRANSFORMATION you are seeking?
Theme words: Sex Magic, Tantra, Shadow, Transformation, Death/Rebirth
Part 3: The APHRODITE Cycle
What do you WANT?
What are your desires?
How does PLEASURE work in your life?
How can you be your truest, most RAW self?
Are you claiming your space and beauty?
What makes you feel most POWERFUL?
Theme words: Pleasure, Art, Power, Beauty, Desire, Delight, Sensuality, Original Self.
I am here as a guide, but I wrote this program so you could feel connected to your own power to recreate your life according to your vision.Right now there is a a lot of fear and despondency on the planet and so many need guidance to remain in the light. You can help others through the information in this book. But of course, you must take care of yourself first. Love yourself first. And fill yourself with so much love and power and Magic so that you have an overflow to give to others.The Unbound circle is designed to give you the materials necessary to guide your own Circle and help increase Joy on the planet.You can make a difference by first diving into this work for yourself.All three of these magical forces have been domesticated, chained and controlled in our patriarchal dominated psyches. But really? These forces are not to be contained.They also represent the Dark Feminine, Rebellion. Subversion.Methods used in the UNBOUND CIRCLE curriculum:
Writing
Imagining/Imaging/Visioning
Meditation
Movement
Planning
Practicing Ritual
Creative Project: Art/Dance/Music/Theatre

story:
Help get Total Theatre Magazine back up and running in time for the Edinburgh Festival Fringe, August 2017! 

For over 30 years, Total Theatre Magazine has been at the forefront of the advocacy and documentation of contemporary theatre and performance practice – and we now need your help if we are to survive. 

In the past, Total Theatre Magazine has been funded by Arts Council England and University of Winchester. Last year (2016) the strings were cut. We staggered on (unpaid) for six months. The website went down early 2017. 

Between March and May 2017, there has been progress. Aurelius Productions has rescued the website, and it has been reinstated at www.totaltheatre.org.uk.

But we need content for our online magazine. We need the funds to re-instate the work of the editors and key writers. We need, specifically, to get the Reviews and Features sections working: to pay the Editor, Web Editor, and Reviews Editor a modest fee; and to create a go-and-see fund to pay expenses for the team to travel to the Edinburgh Fringe 2017, and to other key festivals and events this year.

Total Theatre Magazine is unique as an artist-led practice-based publication and resource that celebrates, supports and documents innovative work by artists and companies creating ‘total theatre’ – a term we resist defining too tightly, but which includes: physical, visual and ensemble devised theatre; dance-theatre; mime and clown; contemporary circus; cabaret and new variety; puppetry and animation; street arts, outdoor performance, and site-specific theatre; live art performance and hybrid arts.

This work is rarely covered in the mainstream press, and often not even in specialist arts publications. Total Theatre Magazine has a 30-year reputation as THE publication that covers physical and visual performance work.

Would you like to help us continue that good work? That would be very much appreciated. Every little helps…  

What We Need

We've set the target at £5,000, which we are hoping to achieve in a six-week campaign.

This will:

  • Pay fees for the Editor, Reviews Editor, and Web Editor for a three-month period, August to October 2017
  • Create a Go-and-See fund which will provide us with the means to get to the Edinburgh Festival Fringe 2017, and other key festivals and events in summer/autumn 2017

Your kind and much valued contribution, of any size, will:

  • Get the Reviews and Features section of the website working again
  • Buy us time to put together a consortium of supporters, to keep Total Theatre Magazine afloat from late 2017 through 2018
  • Give us the space to make funding applications to create an interactive online archive of the magnificent 30+ year set of print editions of the magazine, and other related material
  • Give us time to investigate the exciting possibility of returning to print at some point in the future

You Can Trust Us To Deliver!

We can be trusted – we have steered Total Theatre Magazine through thick and thin for many, many years – and hope to be able to continue this good work.

This is the Editorial Team:

Dorothy Max Prior has edited Total Theatre since 2001, and has written for the magazine since 1997.  When not editing TT, she is the co-director of successful performing arts company The Ragroof Players and is also a freelance writer, director and choreographer. 

John Ellingsworth, the magazine's Deputy Editor for many years, is now in place as consultant and Archives Editor, working with the Editor on the creation of new archive for Total Theatre Magazine. We is  also a freelance writer and editor, working across Europe on many different projects.

Beccy Smith has worked for ten years for Total Theatre, first as a lead writer and then as Reviews Editor. She is a theatre writer and dramaturg who co-drects her own company, Touched Theatre.

Darren East has worked as Web Editor for three years. He is also co-director of Touched Theatre, and a highly respected performer, puppeteer and director.

Between us we have a wealth of experience in writing, editing, publishing, and project management. 

How Can You Help?

If you've ever visited www.totaltheatre.org.uk and enjoyed what you've found there, please donate – anything, no matter how small, will help. 

If you care about contemporary theatre and performance, and want to help to celebrate and support it through Total Theatre Magazine, consider donating.

If you feel that artforms and genres such as physical & visual theatre, contemporary circus, street theatre & outdoor arts, live art, puppetry & animation, and site-responsive theatre need more attention, then consider helping us to do just that by donating.

Thank you!

There Are No Perks

We want Total Theatre Magazine to stay FREE to view online, so we have nothing to offer as a perk – other than our heartfelt thanks and the hope that you feel that your altruism is enough!

If you can't afford to donate but want to help us, please share this appeal on social media. Facebook page Total Theatre Magazine. Twitter @TotalTheatreMag

Keep up with Total Theatre Magazine at www.totaltheatre.org.uk 

Thank you for reading to the end – we appreciate it!

story:
The Problem 

The U.S. has 5% of the world's population, but 25% of its prisoners, 96% of who will return to society.

The annual cost of prisons to the tax payers has been recently estimated at over $80 Billion, which keeps rising. The recidivism rate--the rate at which those released to society return to prison--within 5 years of release, is at over 49%. In other words, $80 Billion spent to fail nearly one-half of the time, without accountability.

This, despite education lowering recidivism rates by nearly 43% and it being shown for every dollar spent on education, four dollars are saved on incarceration.

Investing Toward a Solution 

For the past 17 years I've developed classes for, taught and mentored federal prisoners. A passion realized after coming in as one of them.

Seeing something in me, a friend and mentor showed me how to recognize, take responsibility for and let go of negative ideas, attitudes and beliefs and replace them with ones that have since replaced a life in turmoil with one of profound joy and inner freedom. The path taken to inner freedom was laid out by education acquired from books of substance. I have since strongly wished this freedom for others. Realizing crime's social and financial cost to society, prisons doing little to nothing to help alleviate either, I was inspired to do something to make a difference..

Mark Twain wrote, There are only two important days in a man's life: the day he's born and the day he learns why.

My "why" began with the creation of a life-skills development and reentry preparation course, which introduces a seminar I call "The Tree of Life." It has had a profound positive affect on the prisoners, resulting in nearly 100% of its graduates who've released back to society building successful, contributing lives.

Seeing such success with The Tree of Life message in the lives of people who'd otherwise be considered broken beyond repair, my "why"  expanded, extending it to friends, family and strangers, many of whom bound only in prisons comprised of ego-centric walls. Most of them have since realized freedom from self-imposed limitations, awakened to personal "whys," and now live their passions.

Extending further, I turned the seminar into an educational book of substance, The Tree of Life, Sowing Your Seeds of Destiny,  accompanying it with a companion booklet, The Tree of Life Goal Cards,  excited for its message helping more people from all walks of life. But to ensure this happens, I need help raising the initial costs associated with publication and getting the word out to the world about the book's presence, message and purpose.

These cost total about $1,089.50

4 Filed ISBNs @ $129.00 ea =                         $517.00
(2 for The Tree of Life and 2 for its Goal Card companion, each needing paperback and e-Book formats.)

1 Copyright Fee:                                           $85.00
(For companion book only, a supporter having already covered the fee for the main book.)

1 Registered Trademark Fee:                        $87.50
(For the companion booklet.)

Marketing/Promotional Fees:                        $400.00
(This will cover the initial costs associated with: author-purchased copies, mailing, advertising and webpage upgrade.)

story:
There's Nothing Wrong With You is a children’s picture book geared towards children of the progressive parent.

 

It’s 2016 now, and gender identity and sexual orientation aren’t taboo subjects anymore. They’ve been brought out of the closet, if you’ll pardon my pun, and parents have begun wanting their child to know they’ll be loved no matter who they love or who they are from a young age.

 

Often it’s a hard topic to bring up, though - how do you bring up such a complicated concept like that that adults have trouble grasping in a way where it’s simple and engaging enough for children to understand?

 

Enter There's Nothing Wrong With You. It’s a book about a young boy named Alex, who likes dresses, trucks, dolls, dinosaurs, and boys. His story of being accepted by his Grandma is told in such a way that any child who has their own inner turmoil over being weird or different from others will be able to relate, and feel not so alone. It’s our sincere hope that There's Nothing Wrong With You can help stop self-hatred in LGBT children before it starts, much less before it become deeply rooted, as it shows them love before the world ever shows them hate. Even children not on the LGBT spectrum will love this book for it’s simple message : be who you are, and how it shows them to be more accepting towards the other children in their life. It’s also accompanied by charming illustrations.

 

It’s my belief that this picture book will become a staple for any progressive parent who wants to be sure that their child knows that they’ll love them no matter what, or any parent that wants their child to be kind to other children no matter what. It’ll help open the conversation for more in-depth discussion as the child starts to have questions.

Things people have said:

"As someone, like many others in the LGBT community, who realised very young that they felt different from those around them I can sincerely say I wish I had a book like this when I was young. Just a simple message of normality gives a confidence that you may not otherwise get."

story:
Thank you to everyone that supported my campaign! 

 

About The Book

My wife believes this book was written for her. My mother thinks I’ve put my story on paper because I simply have to keep myself busy, and it was a helpful distraction, when I was in jail. My best friend is sure I must be crazy to be sharing that kind of information. He thinks that even jail can’t tame my hunger for fame, and I want to be remembered in the world that grows more and more delusive as days go by. My editor thinks I’m hoping for a pardon…

These people know me well enough, understand me, and sometimes even read my thoughts. And they’re all right in their different ways. But there is something else. The main thing is, this book is written for you and you only, my dear reader. I’m not that naïve and don’t believe that a dangerous cyber criminal like me with three serious felony convictions on my record, guilty all around, will simply get a pardon. And I’m not a hypocrite to write here that I deserve it.

I will spend 10 years in prison. My beautiful wife will most likely leave me. My much beloved grandfather, who brought me up, will die before I get out. My mother will age due to her grief rather than time. My friends will start seeing me as a ghost, someone they have nothing to discuss with. You don’t share joy from your child’s birthday or your summer trip with a ghost, it’s too awkward. I will also change, I will morph into a psycho with yellow skin and bad teeth. I will be a moral monster, stressed out, angry and violent. I can’t change what’s happened to my life. But your destiny can be different…

Those are lines from my book.

And I'm really on of the best-known cyber criminals in the world. You can read about me here:

  • Wikipedia
  • U.S. Department of Justice
  • GarWarner
  • GarWarner (continue)
  • Ars Technica

And see...

  • TV Rain (Russia)


But it was in the past. Now I am:

  • Entrepreneur
  • Blogger
  • Writer
  • Cyber security expert at CyberSec.org


Why You Need This Book

You have a credit card? Sure you do. So, you're a target for lots of hackers, carders, and other cyber crooks.

  • My book will tell you how to protect your credit cards, bank accounts, IDs, and other sensitive stuff from different fraudsters.
  • You will enter a secret world of Russian cyber criminals and hackers and see hundreds of thousands dollars being stolen and spent on women, expensive cars, restaurants and trips to exotic islands.
  • You will be THE FIRST to see private photos of most wanted hackers and carders from Russia and all over the world. Also pictures from Russian court rooms, jails and penal colonies.
  • I will show you documents from actual legal cases from various countries that will show you just how cyber criminals "work" and how IT crimes are investigated by the police and intelligence agencies. These materials have NEVER been published before!
  • It goes without saying, there are crimes in the book. But there is also remorse. I used myself as an example to show young people of the world not to go down the criminal path – be a business instead. Even better if you run a win-win kind of business, that benefits you, your customers, the state you pay taxes to and the whole world in general.
  • Of course, there is also a love story.

 

What I Need

  • I've paid for the book's translation out of my own pocket, but now I need money to pay a professional American editor to make sure the text is flawless. That's the only way I believe things should be done.
  • I also need money for pre-production costs and the hefty cost of printing. 
    If I raise more than my goal (gasp! that would be amazing!!), I'll be able to expand the reach of How to Steal a Million through publicity, promotion, even a book tour. I'm so excited to spark How to Steal a Million with you!

 

 

What You Get

The most honest and detailed book about cyber crime in the world.

Credit card crime schemes, police and special service operating methods, conditions at prisons and penal colonies that I had been detained at, rogue cops – I thought it wouldn't be fair to make it available to Russian-speaking readers only.


 

Depending on your pledge, you can get:

  • e-book
  • printed edition of the book
  • set e-book + printed edition version
  • printed edition of the book with the author's autograph
  • and more! (see in PERKS)

 

When Will Supporters Receive Their Books? 

After we finish our Indiegogo campaign (7 January 2017), editing and printing will take 8-12 weeks since this is a very detailed and full-color book. Because we live a thousand miles apart, shipping and signing will take some clever coordination! I have listed April 7th as the guaranteed delivery date but I'm hoping you'll get your books and goodies even sooner!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not pledge money for my project, there are other ways you can help me:

  • Tell your friends that may be interested about my project.
  • Share this information of your social media.

 

 Can We Take a Peek Inside the Book?

Yes! Just scroll down to see…

The contents of the book include:

  • 370 pages in 60 x 90/16 format.
  • Documents from actual legal cases
  • Sergey Pavlovich's personal photos as well as at least 70 pictures of world's most famous carders and hackers. 
  • Courtroom art (2 drawings)
  • At least 10 Pictures and drawings from Russian jails and penal colonies. 

​​

The main thing is, this book is written for you and you only, my dear reader. I’m not that naïve and don’t believe that a dangerous cyber criminal like me with three serious felony convictions on my record, guilty all around, will simply get a pardon. And I’m not a hypocrite to write here that I deserve it.
I will spend 10 years in prison. My beautiful wife will most likely leave me. My much beloved grandfather, who brought me up, will die before I get out. My mother will age due to her grief rather than time. My friends will start seeing me as a ghost, someone they have nothing to discuss with. You don’t share joy from your child’s birthday or your summer trip with a ghost, it’s too awkward. I will also change, I will morph into a psycho with yellow skin and bad teeth. I will be a moral monster, stressed out, angry and violent. I can’t change what’s happened to my life. But your destiny can be different…
Those are lines from my book.
And I'm really on of the best-known cyber criminals in the world. You can read about me here:

Wikipedia
U.S. Department of Justice
GarWarner
GarWarner (continue)
Ars Technica

And see...
TV Rain (Russia)
But it was in the past. Now I am:

Entrepreneur
Blogger
Writer
Cyber security expert at CyberSec.org



Why You Need This Book
You have a credit card? Sure you do. So, you're a target for lots of hackers, carders, and other cyber crooks.

My book will tell you how to protect your credit cards, bank accounts, IDs, and other sensitive stuff from different fraudsters.
You will enter a secret world of Russian cyber criminals and hackers and see hundreds of thousands dollars being stolen and spent on women, expensive cars, restaurants and trips to exotic islands.
You will be THE FIRST to see private photos of most wanted hackers and carders from Russia and all over the world. Also pictures from Russian court rooms, jails and penal colonies.
I will show you documents from actual legal cases from various countries that will show you just how cyber criminals "work" and how IT crimes are investigated by the police and intelligence agencies. These materials have NEVER been published before!
It goes without saying, there are crimes in the book. But there is also remorse. I used myself as an example to show young people of the world not to go down the criminal path – be a business instead. Even better if you run a win-win kind of business, that benefits you, your customers, the state you pay taxes to and the whole world in general.
Of course, there is also a love story.

 

What I Need

I've paid for the book's translation out of my own pocket, but now I need money to pay a professional American editor to make sure the text is flawless. That's the only way I believe things should be done.
I also need money for pre-production costs and the hefty cost of printing. If I raise more than my goal (gasp! that would be amazing!!), I'll be able to expand the reach of How to Steal a Million through publicity, promotion, even a book tour. I'm so excited to spark How to Steal a Million with you!


 
 
What You Get
The most honest and detailed book about cyber crime in the world.Credit card crime schemes, police and special service operating methods, conditions at prisons and penal colonies that I had been detained at, rogue cops – I thought it wouldn't be fair to make it available to Russian-speaking readers only.
 
Depending on your pledge, you can get:

e-book
printed edition of the book
set e-book + printed edition version
printed edition of the book with the author's autograph
and more! (see in PERKS)


 
When Will Supporters Receive Their Books? 
After we finish our Indiegogo campaign (7 January 2017), editing and printing will take 8-12 weeks since this is a very detailed and full-color book. Because we live a thousand miles apart, shipping and signing will take some clever coordination! I have listed April 7th as the guaranteed delivery date but I'm hoping you'll get your books and goodies even sooner!
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can not pledge money for my project, there are other ways you can help me:

Tell your friends that may be interested about my project.
Share this information of your social media.

  Can We Take a Peek Inside the Book?Yes! Just scroll down to see…The contents of the book include:
370 pages in 60 x 90/16 format.
Documents from actual legal cases
Sergey Pavlovich's personal photos as well as at least 70 pictures of world's most famous carders and hackers. 
Courtroom art (2 drawings)
At least 10 Pictures and drawings from Russian jails and penal colonies. 
​​

story:
About Me

I started writing at the age of 13 and haven't stop.

 

I Design Book Covers

 

I give writing workshops.

And I mentor aspiring writers...

 

Why Indiegogo?

Seed funding allows me to expand my business, providing the assets and the opportunity to reach more people and impact more lives.

 

My Upcoming Releases

 

 

 

Summary

With decades of being dedicated to my craft, helping others along the way, I'm ready to do more, be more and help more, empowering people to following their writing dreams and celebrate my own.

 

What I Need & What You Get

 

Staffing:     $3000

With the myriad of events I'm planning, support staff is a must.  

 

Book Launch Event:   $5000.00

With the release of my 16th and 17th body of work, I'm celebrating in a big way! Not only will there be a book sign event at a gorgeous venue, but a performance of my one-woman show-- "A New York State of Mind: An Evening With Margaret Johnson-Hodge,"  complete with delicious food and specialty cocktails!

 

Pre-Publicity:  $500.00

While you can't ‘buy’ a good review, you can secure honest ones from these three major giants.

 

Publishing Copies:  $1300.00

This amount is based on a print run for my book release party.

 

Perk

Funding of $275 or more

With a donation of $275 or more, you'll be a special invited guest, receive honorable mention at my book launch event and signed copies of both books, plus shipping. Event is being planned for October, 2017.

 

The Impact

Books have the power to change lives, one tome at a time. I know because a single book--Mya Angelou's "I Know Why The Caged Birds Sings"--changed mines. With everything book I write, aspiring writer I assist, workshop I give and book cover I design, my goal is to inspire someone towards betterment, reflective in both my professional, readership  and workshop reviews.

Professional reviews:

"Fresh writing and an honest recognizable heroine." –Publishers Weekly 

"Johnson-Hodge offers a poignant and lyrical tale of dreams lost, dreams deferred and dreams reborn." –Booklist

"A book so memorable it will become a classic in years to come." –Midwest Book Review 

 

What my readers had to say:

“This book was recommended to me by my boyfriend. I was skeptical at first, but it had me from the very first page. This book really deals with issues that women of today face as far as their personal relationships with their men and people in general. I cried, I laughed, and I cried again. I truly love this book.”

“A Journey to Here reminded me why I love Margaret Johnson Hodge and rekindled my desire to absorb more of her work. A beautiful, honest look at the consequences of betrayal (perceived or otherwise), and the rebuilding of shattered lives. Loved it!”

“I appreciate how Johnson-Hodges takes this controversial subject and presents it without extreme craziness. Instead, she allows the reader in delve into the inner person and explores why they do the things they do. As always Margaret Johnson Hodges has given readers a well written, interesting and captivating novel that is highly recommended.”

 

What my writing workshop participants had to say:

     “I found it unique and thought-inspiring.”   - Liz M.

      “...opened the door on how to start writing.”  - Pedro R. 

      "...gave me a lot of ideas to combat writer’s block.”  - Mary W. 

      “I discovered I still had stories inside of me!”    - Alana M. 

 

More About Me...

 You can visit my Youtube channel  "MJH Writing and Publishing"  to find out more.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can provide additional support by purchasing some of my previous works on my website http://www.mjhodge.net/book-store.html  Unlike Amazon and barnesandnoble.com, I offer personally autographed copies and I don't have to wait 60 days, less Amazon's 55% to receive the proceeds!

If you know of someone who would like to attend my Book Release Party, please let them know they can email me at mjhodge@bellsouth.net, stating that they'd like to be on the invite list.

Please know that I will use whatever funds I receive towards my business expansion and that I dream the impossible and make the impossible come true, for myself and others.  Thank you for your interest.

story:
I believe Overcoming Bias and Racism in Your Workspace will help you in having success and reducing discrimination.  Most importantly this book will give you the tools, practices, and strategies to help you disarm racism and bias.  It will also aid you in working with difficult individuals that you undoubtedly come across during your career.  And it will aid the reader to thrive and maintain their dignity and self-respect while they work in their chosen occupation.  No matter what the political, racial, or ideological climate. 

With 30 years of management experience in a non-diverse environment I share tools that can help the reader plan and function well in his day to day.  I use real life stories to illustrate different situations and business, process, and people issues that may come up.

Many times we think all issues we face are people related, but ingrained business and process issues must also be understood and rooted out if we want to be successful.  In fact, they are often the basis for how things are done or have progressed in an organization.

Understanding all three will give you a much more positive chance for success.  Success will be you enjoying your work experience and being able to deal effectively with situations of racism and bias.  Success will also be effectively converting bigots and naysayers one person at a time as necessary.  Those successes will provide a more positive and productive work environment for us all.   

I would like to have Overcoming Bias and Racism in Your Workspace available for college curriculums and bookstores after the holiday break.  This requires additional resources, marketing and publishing requirements for the college book market.  The Perks are here to help spread the word and help anyone with the book as a source of support and to say Thank You.  

Book excerpt and interview available on gregharrisauthors.com

story:
Who I Am & What I Do

I'm Joanna Hastings. I'm a writer, educator, and theatre professional.  I've spent the last 30 years as an actor, playwright, storyteller. teacher, principal, and mother. I’ve thought a lot about what inspires kids, how to get them to engage deeply with their own creative selves. Now I’m able to focus full time as an author in a highly original, experiential genre. I’ve brought my knowledge of kids with me, and I’ve created a unique reading experience for them that makes them feel personally invited into a special, magical world. You can see how it works here.

I’ve created and tested eleven Story Experiences, complete with fascinating artifacts, often vintage or hand-crafted, which bring a unique sense of authenticity to the Stories. More are on the way: I have three Stories in development right now.  Now I'm ready to take Flying Trunk Stories to the next level and engage a wider audience. In order to to do this, I have to find powerful, accessible ways to let people know that this company, and this unusual product, exist. I invite you to share my journey!

 

What I Need & What You Get

My Indiegogo goal is $15,000. In order to successfully expand Flying Trunk Stories, I have to radically increase awareness of my product through website promotion at a local and national level. 

The most important expense is social media marketing: coordinated, complementary, continuous campaigns on Facebook, Pinterest and Instagram.  

To support that, I need to invest in photography and video, my second most important expense. These assets will support website enhancements, social media campaigns, and media packets for publications and TV. 

I need printed materials, most importantly brochures for live events and media packets. 

So your money will go towards these different aspects of marketing, fulfilling perks, and IndieGoGo fees (without which none of this could happen. 

The most fun part will be sharing aspects of the Stories with you as perks! There are many ways and levels to get a taste of the Flying Trunk world. We start with small, magical artifacts with an intriguing message from a character, and go all the way up to a completely new, unique Story Experience written and crafted specifically for a child you love.

 

Risks & Challenges

I've put my heart into FTS, and also my resources. Now, the biggest obstacle that I face is lack of funding to spread the word. The main risk is simply that I won’t be able to raise enough money to ignite marketing and gain enough ground to support credibility with the public. That's why I'm here, and that's why I'm turning to you. Every step I can make towards a greater reach makes my business stronger, and makes my Stories more accessible to families and kids who will be excited by them.  

I have produced 11 stories this year with more on the way, and the recipients can verify the quality and prompt delivery. Scalability will be a good challenge: I work alone right now, and am fortunate to have the skills and experience to be able to handle that. I will need more person-power to stay on top of orders once demand increases; the high level of personalization makes for a time-consuming product. I'm confident that, with your help, greater reach will allow the business to be sustainable and offer the ability to employ assistants in the future.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Want to help but can't spare the money right now? I am so grateful for your goodwill and support. Share this campaign! Share my website! Talk me up! Use Facebook, Twitter, any other social media platforms you like to share links and encourage interest. Tag your friends who have children–they’ll be thrilled to learn about a magical experience for their kids. They may want to help. Share! Share! Share! Thank you!

 

Reviews for Flying Trunk

You can see more on the website!

Awwwwww. Violet loves Roberta Rabbit. 

“My 10 year old just presented her dad with a handwritten, original poem, rolled up into a scroll and tied with a pretty ribbon. This is a girl with a bright mind and severe fine motor skill deficits. I've never seen her write something without prompting before. Well done, Flying Trunk Stories! Now excuse me, I think I am going to go cry.” —Carolyn N. (parent)

“She loved it! She couldn’t wait to show it to everyone. Her mother and her both participated and had a ball. She opened up the last package with me and she was so excited. She absolutely loved it. I have to say it was quite the experience for her. I am so thankful.” —Greg S. (grandparent)

See Lily’s smile? Can’t love it enough.

“It’s just a really marvelous service that you are providing. There are no screens involved at all. There’s a magical essence to this storytelling that I think is lost for a lot of kids; Flying Trunk Stories provides that for them. There are not a lot of opportunities for kids to experience that kind of magic. I really appreciate that you include older kids, too. Middle schoolers, especially, are often overlooked in experiences like this; they still have that childlike spark in them that needs to be nurtured.” —Nancy H. (grandparent)

That face! Andrew opens a parcel. 

“My son is enjoying this birthday gift so much!  It is his private tale that he treasures and looks forward to -- couldn't recommend it more highly!”  —Karen P. (parent)

“The story isn’t just magical and fun—it has layers, and it made her think and question. Thank you, Flying Trunk!” —Abby H. (parent)

“We were so impressed by the story that our four-year-old daughter received from Flying Trunk Stories. Kids don’t often get mail of their own; our Anna loved receiving not just mail, but packages, every week. Every day, she would run to the mailbox to see if Roberta Rabbit had sent another package. The experience of receiving letters with artifacts was magical for Anna; she was so engaged listening to every detail of Bobbie’s journey, while she turned her newest artifact over and over in her hands. We adults were enchanted.” —Kristin H-P. (parent)

"I felt like I was in a book or a movie!" –Lindsay J. (recipient, age 14)

Stories are good for siblings too! These two. ❤️

 

A Taste of the Stories

You can find them all on the website!

Roberta is a brave Rabbit with a huge heart. She wants an egg to love. Fish lay eggs. So do birds and dragons. But who has an egg for Bobby Bunny? She needs a child’s help. So she sends letters along with fascinating objects she finds on her adventures. Ages 4–7

 

A Genie leaves his neglected Lamp in search of a new destiny. He enlists the help of each child through letters and magical artifacts as he billows around having hilarious and extraordinary adventures. Ages 8–10

 

In a girl-power twist on the original fairy tales, Snow White disappears. Cinderella, Rapunzel and Sleeping Beauty go on an undercover mission to find her. They report directly to a child, sending letters and, of course, enchanting artifacts. Ages 8–12

 

A spirit wolf helps a young teen find a missing child in Michigan’s Porcupine Mountains. The teen writes to a young friend—as it were, your child—and sends mystical objects during this rite-of-passage adventure. Ages 11–13

 

Twin sisters in a magical realm struggle to overcome an evil power. One sister mysteriously disappears. The other must venture into strange worlds to fight the enemy who seeks to entrap them both. She asks for a child’s help, sending powerful artifacts and mysterious clues. Ages 10–16

story:
Actum est in manus sinistra

 

INDIEGOGO for

BALINTAWAK ESKRIMA, VOL II

Guro’ Sam Buot

 

Friends:

 

This is the second edition of my book Balintawak Eskrima - my first-hand account as the oldest living survivor of Grandmaster Anciong Bacon. I am a passionate and avid promoter of this indigenous Filipino Martial Art, Eskrima/Kali/Arnis.  A significant portion of my life has been dedicated toward its advancement - starting as a student over half a century ago, then as a teacher, a historian and chronicler of group events. My peers insist on calling me grandmaster. My preference is the less pretentious term guro’ for teacher.  Otherwise, I would rather be called Manong Sam, a fond and affectionate term of respect and endearment accorded to an older brother or older gentleman.

 

This book is a brief compendium of Philippine historical facts. It is also a definitive record of a history of the art, its masters and legends - its foundation, techniques, principles, philosophies and a glossary of common eskrima lexicon.  Likewise included are our shared hopes for young masters and the future of the art.  This book will contain a plethora of illustrative and historical pictures.  It will be an expansion of the current edition, to appear most possibly in two volumes.

                       

            Acknowledgment of help and donation:

-      $200 or more contribution shall be considered as Sponsors of the project and will appear in an appendix on the book and receive an autographed copy of the book.

-      $50 or more contribution shall be acknowledged as a Patron and listed in the appendix of the book.

-      All Other contributions will receive a letter of thanks from me for your help and contribution.

Thank you for your support in promoting the art of Philippine national hero Dr. Jose Rizal, an extraordinary native Philippine martial art.

 

Guro’ Sam Buot, Sr.,

Author
story_txt:
Actum est in manus sinistra
 
INDIEGOGO for
BALINTAWAK ESKRIMA, VOL II
Guro’ Sam Buot
 
Friends:
 
This is the second edition of my book Balintawak Eskrima - my first-hand account as the oldest living survivor of Grandmaster Anciong Bacon. I am a passionate and avid promoter of this indigenous Filipino Martial Art, Eskrima/Kali/Arnis.  A significant portion of my life has been dedicated toward its advancement - starting as a student over half a century ago, then as a teacher, a historian and chronicler of group events. My peers insist on calling me grandmaster. My preference is the less pretentious term guro’ for teacher.  Otherwise, I would rather be called Manong Sam, a fond and affectionate term of respect and endearment accorded to an older brother or older gentleman.
 
This book is a brief compendium of Philippine historical facts. It is also a definitive record of a history of the art, its masters and legends - its foundation, techniques, principles, philosophies and a glossary of common eskrima lexicon.  Likewise included are our shared hopes for young masters and the future of the art.  This book will contain a plethora of illustrative and historical pictures.  It will be an expansion of the current edition, to appear most possibly in two volumes.
                       
            Acknowledgment of help and donation:
-      $200 or more contribution shall be considered as Sponsors of the project and will appear in an appendix on the book and receive an autographed copy of the book.
-      $50 or more contribution shall be acknowledged as a Patron and listed in the appendix of the book.
-      All Other contributions will receive a letter of thanks from me for your help and contribution.
Thank you for your support in promoting the art of Philippine national hero Dr. Jose Rizal, an extraordinary native Philippine martial art.
 
Guro’ Sam Buot, Sr.,
Author

story:
Precog Magazine

is an independent, annual magazine dealing with technology, materiality, and visual culture, emphasizing the contributions of women and non-binary artists and artists of color, published and produced by artists Florencia Escudero, Gaby Collins-Fernandez, and Kellie Konapelsky. We aim to support artists by publishing their ideas and images on their own terms, and to use our physical print platform to create opportunities for community and conversation. 

Funds for Printing and Commissions!

100% of the funds we make from selling the magazine and merchandise featuring artworks and themes from the magazine go back into printing. Our goal of $7000 would allow us to:

  • Print Issue 4: Empire Vampire 
  • Reprint Issue 3: Transformation
  • Support the creation and printing of Issue 5, including compensation for contributors, and the production of a digital version of the magazine as a virtual game
  • Expand our reach and audience by having more physical copies available for distributors and academic libraries

Precog Perks

Perks for this campaign include pre-ordering Issue 4, purchasing back issues of the magazine, and our hand-produced, limited edition merchandise. 

The Impact

Precog Magazine is unique in that it is made by artists, in support of artists. We are committed to using print publication both as a medium for our contributors to experiment, and as a platform to communicate their ideas to a wider audience. Funding for this project would allow the magazine itself to become more experimental, and greater financial security would help us to advocate for our contributors!

The biggest obstacle in the creation of Precog is the cost of publishing a magazine independently. With limited resources, we are also constrained to smaller print runs, which (beside being more expensive per issue than a larger run) limits the booksellers, academic libraries, and outside groups we can approach to carry the magazine. 

Previous fundraising efforts and your excitement about Precog is one of the reasons we can still make the magazine each year! This has allowed us to participate in the New York Art Book Fair, as well as other book fairs nationally and internationally, which is why we are confident that this fundraising drive will have such a big impact on our reach. We are so appreciative of the community which already exists around Precog, and hope to find ways to make that community grow in terms of the artists we include, our supporters, and our audience. 

Please share widely, regardless of your ability to contribute. We depend on word of mouth, and are excited and appreciative of all the forms of community that arise!
