story:
Our Book:

The name of the book is “diary of a gay spiritual manic depressive”. The book covers gay life for gay men in their thirties. This is a phrase used constantly. Almost always used negatively, the word "gay" now an often time carries a condescending and offensive connotation. Our book aims to shine a light on today’s society, to save the society, to help stabilize the decline of society, to think again to improve the society by telling you the meaning of life dispel religion, heaven and hell and work towards creating a better good.

If the book is published read and learned, it can have a huge impact on society. It covers the damage Joel Simkhai did when he invented Grindr and points out how the damage he did can be undone if he listens. It depicts the negative impact of Grindr which makes it harder for culture to maintain the momentum of social recognition.

Also Mark Zuckerberg could be educated too to help undo the damage he did with facebook and in particular facebook mobile and the affect it has had on society and how IBM's smartphone is leading to the demise of society. Zuckerberg has some scary plans for the future that will destroy a lot of society unless someone can reach him; the book covers the next phase of Facebook too.

The book addresses many gay issues facing an older gay man and provides a blueprint on how to help them. For manic depressives it details coping mechanisms covering everyday lives. The most interesting part is the spiritual aspect which tells the true story of creation, the truth about reincarnation, magic, the meaning of life, the truth about GOD, heaven, hell, who created the universe and why we are here. Also it has the potential if taken on board to put a stop to all the lying religions, and covers demonic attack, soul loss and retrieval. It has romantic aspects, betrayal, revenge, tragedy, War, death and the story of one of the most powerful Warlocks to be around since the dawn of time. 

It is the truth, it is brutal but it is worth reading and knowing and if taken on board the political aspects such as how to make the NHS profitable and keep it public would help society in numerous ways. It is just more than a book which will have a huge impact on society. It will help stabilize the decline of society, help undo the damage done by facebook, smartphones and the government and will help make people think again about improving society and caring about others.

Our Goal:

What this campaign is designed to do is allow us to hire an editor craft our book in the best possible way. The £5,000 represents the bare amount we would need to pay for the same and to publish the book, “Diary of a gay spiritual manic depressive”.

We assure you that we know that all who donate truly do care about the project, and we assure you that that care is not for naught. We can guarantee that every penny donated will be matched by steadfast focus, determination and hard work. In the end, for a little funding you could potentially have a huge impact on society for the better. 

 But why not throw in some perks, too? No matter how much you donate, you will receive an expression of our gratitude. From a special thanks included in the acknowledgement of yours in the book, we plan on rewarding every single person who shows faith in our project, our book, our vision and our noble cause.

Hence I am connecting people round the globe with the faith to support the same. Your small donation more than anything to us and will help us to hit our goal.

Risks & Challenges:

Making a book is extremely fun, but also painstakingly difficult. We know we will encounter many challenges while making this book, but with our faith, our experience, under different circumstances and time constraints, we know that we will be able to rise above any obstacles presented to us.

Still, it never hurts to prepare. With set deadlines spanning across all levels, we know without a doubt that our vision will not only be executed in the style that we want, but exactly when we want and promise to our backers.

Our Request:

We encourage you to spread the word of our book and our campaign. No matter how large, any and all contributions help us more than you can imagine. We ask you to please spread the word! Indiegogo features plenty of sharing abilities, and our film has pages on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.

story:
PRE-ORDER YOUR COPY of 'Sadly The Owl - An Untold Tale' today and help us up the MADE IN CANADA print run to bring down costs while keeping our production local. Oiweh, we are a long ways away but we sincerely believe we can find 200 owl lovers over the next 10 days who have had more than a sad day in their life and who would love to make the mental health discussion a more open and less stigmatized one. 

Sadly the Owl is a line-dancing Owl who loves to jump out of bed to shine his red cowboy boots. One day he wakes up and a big dark cloud appears above his head. This is a tale about more than just sad days and we can't wait to see Sadly shine his red cowboy boots again. 

Ages 3 - 103. 100% MADE IN CANADA. 32 pages. Hardcover. Educational Conversation Starter.

HOW
Choose a perk and lean back feeling really good about making this world a little more AWESOME (that's what kid president would do...if you don't know kid president go and ask the google now). Your perk will arrive as soon as we've got it made and we're looking at a September 2015 pub date so the wait is short. File in date is July 31st and we're in cruise control with our final lag in site. 

THE PERKS 
We think they are pretty self explanatory. We hope you agree?! The one we are keeping our fingers crossed for is the Name Typeset into the Endsheets perk. Just imagine...there could be more than a couple of handfuls of us who have our first names, nicknames, or family names typeset into beautifully designed endsheets. We'd make an enormous statement. It would be like holding hands and walking into the light together. Of course this is also the place where you can honour someone and thank them for supporting you through your sadness. Depression affects all of us...so all of our names deserve to be there. 

THE HANG UP
There is none. Every penny helps us keep the production local as it brings the cost per book down. Thanks to the success of the first campaign this little miracle book is going into print for sure. 

THE REST OF THE STUFF YOU MAY WANT TO KNOW
After publishing Our Canadian Love Story in 2013 and Pom Pom A Flightless Bully Tale in Dec 2014, it's time to get even more close and personal. 

In theory Sadly should be a girl because this little sad owl is autobiographic. And if we haven't met, I'm Linnie von Sky and the pleasure is all mine.

Depression appears rampant as Mental Health conversations are finally seeing the light of day. In reality Depression has always been around. It has stolen too many days and crushed too many dreamers. Today it's time to speak up. Depression is REAL and it SUCKS...at least it sucked the living daylight out of me and consumes too many people I love.

I'm joined by the incredible Ashley O'Mara. Ashley is a Vancouverite, Emily Carr Graduate, Bird Lover (she draws the cutest darn chickens I've ever seen) and like me, knows a thing or two about how much depression hurts. Ashley has imagined my words into illustrations that have blown me away and that have touched my soul. I feel so grateful that she has joined me in Sadly the Owl's journey. 

We're so happy to have created an educational conversation starter that will help you and your loved ones launch into a tête-à-tête around mental health and wellbeing. It's time to be more candid about our emotional state. We sincerely hope that Sadly the Owl will teach us to speak out sooner, so that any of us hurting may seek the help that we deserve. Life is too wonderful to let it pass us by while we draw our curtains and wither away. Everyone deserves to feel loved, happy and full of hope for today and their bright future.

The lovely Lindsay, a reporter for Vancity Buzz, recently asked me in an interview why I address the most challenging of topics in the form of children's books? I told her, like I'll tell you, that immigration, bullying and depression play on the most instinctive concepts of human emotion: loneliness, hurt, pain, sadness, togetherness, friendship, love, hope and respect, to name just a few, are all feelings that children understand very well. Never underestimate the intelligence of young humans. Their minds are magical. 

MERCI
That pretty much sums this section up. Thank you so very much! Pretty please let's make this happen. 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
Hoot Your Beaks Off!!!

We're on the instagram, the facebook, the world wide web. Share away. After all the magic power lies in sharing our stories. 

ONE FINAL NOTE
Please be nice to all the Sadlies in your life. Summers and sunshine can be especially difficult if you're simply too depressed to partake. 

Wishing you the loveliest of seasons and thank you from the bottom of our little beating owl hearts.

Linnie, Ashley and last, though certainly not least, Sadly
♥♥♥

story:
The Story

“Between Darkness and Light” is a book that aims to utilize Shaun Singh's stories and photography post his divorce to inspire and heal others, thus linking these life events to being a survivor of domestic violence.


The Book

“Between Darkness and Light” is Shaun Singh’s book of personal photography and prose of his time on the island of Puerto Rico. This revealing and uplifting work will take you on one man’s journey through the healing process after divorce.  All linked to him being a child of abuse.

Shaun witnessed the abuse of his mother and the abuse of other women close to him. He is also a survivor of his own abuse. Essentially, his message is that beauty can emerge from the darkness of your life. 


The Impact

 “Between Darkness and Light” is Shaun’s attempt to creatively and artistically connect the dots of the long-term effects of abuse.  He hopes that by sharing his experiences it will help connect the dots for other survivors of abuse.

Shaun’s ultimate goal continues to be his larger dream to run the production of “Rang: Shades of My Soul” Off-Broadway and tour it nationally. 

Domestic Violence Statistics:
-Nearly 3 in 10 women (29%) and 1 in 10 men (10%) in the US have experienced rape, physical violence and/or stalking by a partner and report a related impact on their functioning.

-Nearly, 15% of women (14.8%) and 4% of men have been injured as a result of IPV that included rape, physical violence and/or stalking by an intimate partner in their lifetime.

-1 in 4 women (24.3%) and 1 in 7 men (13.8%) aged 18 and older in the United States have been the victim of severe physical violence by an intimate partner in their lifetime.

-Females ages 18 to 24 and 25 to 34 generally experienced the highest rates of intimate partner violence.


What we need & what you get

Our revised estimated budget is over $2,000, which includes the creation and production of the book and Indiegogo.com fees. In the event the actual expenses exceed our financial goal, all funds will go towards the production of producing more copies of the publication. It will also assist with our on going projects to bring about even more awareness of domestic violence.

·  Book production: $2,000

·  Indiegogo.com fees:  9% depending on reaching our fundraising goals.

Perk options (see perks gallery) allows you to become a part of our small and unique family of Artists making a difference. You will also be included on some of our upcoming high profile events with celebrity names. We are also


Other ways you can make a difference

We believe that every story, every piece of art, every experience via the arts can indeed bring about the necessary for change in how we view domestic violence. And, if you are reading this, you are already a part of the movement.

Your financial help is necessary and we also understand that not everyone can contribute financially; however, you can still help by spreading the word. You can do your part by sharing our campaign on your Facebook, Twitter, your blog, and/or website. In addition, if you have any access to media outlets: Writers, Editors, Bloggers, TV, & etc., please share this campaign.  We need all the help possible to make a real impact!


Thank You!
Shaun Singh

help by spreading the word. You can do your part by sharing our campaign on
your Facebook, Twitter, your blog, and/or website. In addition, if you have any
access to media outlets: Writers, Editors, Bloggers, TV, & etc., please share this
campaign.  We need all the help possible to make a real impact!
Thank You!
Shaun Singh

story:
Hello, there. I am Jeff Strawman, webmaster and editor of Achilles Last Stand, a Led Zeppelin fansite (http://www.led-zeppelin.org). Since launching the website in 1996, I have reached Led Zeppelin fans in 214 countries, and made many, many friends along the way.

My top goal with Achilles Last Stand is to create the best Led Zeppelin-related website online. I have spent many hours to make it what it is today. One of the sections in the website details what gear the members of Led Zeppelin have used throughout their careers. Led Zeppelin Gear is the next step.

I want to take Led Zeppelin Gear to print!

Although Led Zeppelin Gear was started as an online resource, and I will continue to update the website, I have always dreamt of making a physical book. And now I am doing it! Led Zeppelin Gear will be a beautiful way to preserve some of the content I have featured online and allow it to be enjoyed virtually anywhere.

The book will be a gorgeous piece around 600 pages. It will feature noteworthy information on a lot the instrumentation, amplification, effects and accessories that were used, as described in interview by Jimmy Page, John Paul Jones, John Bonham and Robert Plant, as well as some of the people that were there, such as Roger Mayer, Andy Johns, Bruce Becvar, Jeff Ocheltree and Andy Manson.

Why this book?

There are many Led Zeppelin-related books currently available. Some feature biographies on the band members, some feature the live experience, and are a catch-all, encyclopedia-style, however there is not a book available about the gear that Led Zeppelin used.

There are gear books available for other bands, such as The Rolling Stones, Greatful Dead and The Beatles, however there is not a book available about the gear that Led Zeppelin used.

Who am I to write it?

Who am I am why should you consider funding and/or reading this book? I am not a former member of Led Zeppelin’s road crew, I wasn’t there while Led Zeppelin was an active band. I don’t work for Gibson or Fender or Marshall. In short, I am not an expert. I am just a thirty-something guy with a deep interest in Led Zeppelin and a penchant for perfection. I started researching for this book sixteen years ago.

In addition to being a Led Zeppelin fan, I am also a musician. I grew up in a musical house. All of my immediate family are musically inclined. After starting with piano as a young child and playing the baritone and tuba, beginning in elementary, I began playing the bass guitar in the summer after senior year of high school. I’ve played in bands for the last twenty-one years and have really made it a point to pay attention to the detail of gear that the various bandmates have used.

Obviously, with being in bands, I am a great lover of music. Although I listen to most genres of music, classic rock of the 1960s and 1970s is my favorite. Led Zeppelin was introduced to me by high school friend, who spun his mom’s Zeppelin vinyl after school.

I grew up in the generation with a computer in every classroom and have been involved with technology my entire adult life. I remember in 1994, while in college, I remember learning about this relatively new thing called HyperText Markup Language that interpret text and images on to the World Wide Web. I recall a handful of Led Zeppelin websites that popped up of the next few years and they often presented different information on the same topics. I figured that I needed to create a website about Led Zeppelin.

I found a web hosting company that offered unlimited space and bandwidth and after a few years of presenting my Led Zeppelin website as a sub-domain on my personal website (www.fancyketchupguy.com – now defunct – don’t ask!), I purchased www.led-zeppelin.org and presented my website there. My website had A LOT of information, as I scoured the internet for every bit and piece of related content. In addition, I’ve picked the brains of a lot of people, including members of the Led Zeppelin, CEOs from gear manufacturers and people who are just plain intelligent. With a fine-tooth comb. I’ve spent countless hours at many libraries searching through books, magazines and newspapers. I want to have the best Led Zeppelin-related website online.

What to expect of Led Zeppelin Gear?

Led Zeppelin Gear consists of seven chapters that gives a whole look into a lot of information. The book is written chronologically, beginning with the first time each piece of gear was used for each member.

Chapter One, Jimmy Page: The Grand Sorcerer, which comes from a description from Keith Relf, prior to performing Shapes Of Things at the Anderson Theatre, in New York City, New York, on March 30, 1968. From playing Baby, Let’s Play House on a found Spanish guitar to the Martin D-28 Marquis acoustic guitar that was used by Page on his last live performance, on November 5, 2011, the reader will learn about Page use of selected pieces of signature gear to create the sound he wanted.

Chapter Two, John Paul Jones: The Groove, lets the reader learn that Jones is much, much more than just a bass guitarist. He is a multi-instrumentalist that is not afraid to pick up any instrument or have any instrumented crafted to get the music out of his head and projected out through his fingers. Jones had never stopped evolving and transforming sound and was never stuck or felt comfortable in just one genre.

Chapter Three, John Bonham: The Thunder, chronicles a kid from the Black Country that went from rags to riches in his eighteen-year professional musical career. The world will never see another drummer with Bonham’s hard-hitting, technical expertise, being able to stay slightly behind the beat, showmanship and good looks.

Chapter Four, Robert Plant: The Lion, addresses that skinny, blond, head-strong Adonis who wanted to make it on his terms. He hasn’t been linked to only just one genre of music, while still appearing current.

Chapter Five, Three Hours of Lunacy, discusses the PA (public address) systems that were used at live Led Zeppelin concerts, from the earliest days up to their last performance in 2007.

Chapter Six, Magic Studio Days, is a song-by-song analysis of the gear that was used in the studio, both by the members of Led Zeppelin, as well by the engineers. Also included is a study of the tracks in each song, as well as some history on the songs.

What is so special about this book?

1.  First of all – me. Nineteen years of research by a 30-something Led Zeppelin fanatic has resulted in a very thorough written experience.

2.  Led Zeppelin Gear is a jam-packed book. All 600+ pages (~120,000 words) are full of well-known and some not-so-well-known information.

3.  The approach. I am not here for a quick buck. This is my honest and truthful tribute to Led Zeppelin. I have gone to great lengths to make this book as grand as it could be.

Your support means the world to me.

I am thrilled about the prospect of seeing Led Zeppelin Gear in print, and I hope you are, too. There are a variety of costs associated with a project of this size, and you support will allow me to:

·  Set aside time to focus on finishing writing the book

·  Copy editing content

·  Secure print rights for photographs

·  Secure ISBNs (International Standard Book Numbers) for printed and electronic versions

·  Pay for the printing costs up front

Keep in mind that all pledges are subject to Indegogo and/or PayPal fees which amount to about 10-12% of the total funds.

The Perks

Led Zeppelin Gear is being released in three different offerings: the eBook, the hard cover book and the leather bound book.

The eBook will be in your choice of format (EPUB, MOBI, AZW3, PDF, etc.) for compatibility on your eReader.

The hard cover book will be printed on 60 lb 420PPI (pages per inch) 94 opacity paper with a high-gloss cover, created by designer Gerson Vecchi. The book is in a US trade 6x9 inch size.

The leather bound book will be a hand-bound in black leather, decorated with a gold stamp on the front.

And, just because, there will be an 11x17 inch, full gloss commemorative promotional poster available.

So, what?  Now, what?

Well, this is the moment when I turn the mic to you... As you will see in the perks, the contributions that I am shooting for are pre-sales, rather than charitable donations (although I am not in the position to turn those down either!).

If you cannot contribute, I would be very grateful if you could share this campaign. Please join the Facebook page or follow Led Zeppelin Gear on Twitter. By doing this, I can keep you in the loop about this book, and my next project (yes, something is cooking already!).

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT AND CONSIDERATION!

story:
My name is Alex, I am in my twenties(not saying age because I don't want to), I am an unskilled worker, but sometimes skilled at other things and I do my work well and I like my life a lot(which is unusual for a writer/philosopher) I have many best friends who are all number one and I will dedicate this book to them.(In spirit, it's actually dedicated to the people who buy the prizes)

It is my lifelong dream of being a writer, I am good writing so I want to make good literature to perspire a gneration, and my work often includes complex themes like love and hate and war and death and metaphysical existence beyond the realm of human consciousness.

I will put money to good use and buy writing supply and then I will write the great america novel(despite being English - plot twist).

Sadly I was born into poor family and have no writer materials other than this notebook, which cantain no notes because I lack a pen, and I want all of the pens. I usually handwrite things as my handwriting is easy to read like a smart and capable student of medisin. 

I also work full time so I have little time to write so I try my best and will hope to get result for you quick, I have wrote 25 THOUSAND word in last month through I can make time and space for the write. I believe that if I had pens I could triple my output to SEVERNTYFIVE thousand a month, and that's basically a novel idea.

I have writen many poetry and they are a passon of mine because I like to rhyme things with other things, which as we all know is the basic of poetic, like words like emphatic and newmatic. Also complecks rhyming schemes like iambic tentametre. I like the worlds of Eddie Allan Poe and t.s. eliott.


I will make sure to write story with important conflict that will entertain and bring hope, understand and happiness to all for a generation or maybe more, and will make a lot of joy for all world.

Reasons I belief to be qualified for writing: I like writing, also I am a white, european man who has beard and smokes cigars and drinks dark spirits and listen to classical music. I also read the best books like the Dicken and Breakspear and even Games of the throne. I also enjoy the best cinema in the world like Spielberg and trantino and Christhopper Nolan.

My favourite passtime is considering philosophy and reading and listening to music, usually sometimes occasionally all at the same time, my favourite band is schopenhauer and the beatles. Continental philosphy is not good, they should call it incontinental philosphy because its a bunch of shit.

I also wrote a fantasy novel wonce which had a main town called "bababadalgharaghtakamminarronnkonnbronntonnerronntuonnthunntrovarrhounawnskawntoohoohoordenenthurnuk!" it is a very good fantasy name, it sounds vaguely nordic and you can imagine lots of dragons being there!

Below is an example of my writing:

Hello said Jim, and nobody in particular replied, Alyosha was too busy being a dick and Quentin was off smoking weed every day in his tent, cuckoo cuckoo cuckoo called the bird that sat in a tree far in the distance, it was a toucan. Toucan play at that game, thought Jim; and he ran all the way to the tree, it was not a toucan at all but a man who was naked and looked forboding, so he went away and drank some sapsarilla, there was drugs in it so it turned out alright in the end, then he saw a gun on the floor, so he picked it up and buried it, and the gun served no further purpose and was never seen again.


PS. Every poem and short story will be a one-time-only handwritten Alex original, I will not skimp and try and send dupicates to people, you get wat your pay for and for me it is quality and quantity. One day they will all be rare writings and worth way more than you pay for them now, so treasure them always!

story:
Breve reseña

Si has llegado hasta aquí es porque te gusta lo que hago.

Estoy muy feliz de poder compartir con todos vosotros un momento tan especial. Después de cuatro colecciones toca presentarse en la pasarela madrileña. En la edición de Febrero 2016 presentaré una colección maravillosa en la que ahora estoy trabajando muy duro y con mucha dedicación.

Con ésta campaña os pido que seais parte de mi sueño. Que cada uno de vosotros esté presente en mi proyecto de futuro. Un futuro que dia a día se está convirtiendo en presente y del que me siento muy orgulloso.

Con vuestra colaboración podré inscribirme en la pasarela  y lograr que miles de periodistas, redactores y profesionales de la moda vean mi próxima colección.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Para encontrar financianción para la puesta en marcha de mi proyecto necesito 10.000 euros que van destinados a la compra de material para realizar la colección, el pago de las horas de trabajo de mi personal y la inscripción para poder presentarme en una pasarela.

Las recompensas que he elaborado con mi equipo de trabajo son estupendas para todos los fieles seguidores de mi marca.

Puedes colaborar con la cantidad que tu prefieras. Cualquier opción que elijas será bien recibida. Con tu apoyo podré lograr mi sueño, eso siempre estará en mi corazón.


Reconocimiento

Llegar hasta aquí no ha sido un camino de rosas. Sin embargo, el esfuerzo ha dado sus frutos y el pasado mes de octubre recibí el Premio Dedales de Oro 2015 por mi aportación a la moda. Éste premio fue una bendición que me ha dado fuerza para seguir en mi camino.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Por favor, ayudame a difundir mi campaña, será de gran ayuda para mi proyecto.

Puedes compartirlo desde los enlaces de Indiegogo.

Puedes compartirlo desde los enlaces de Indiegogo.

story:
Who am I?

I'm Jim Makichuk and have been in the film business for thirty-five years.  But there's another part of me. Highways, truck stops and people I meet on the road.  You'll discover them in a collection of stories in a book I call "How To Not Get Beat-Up In A Small-Town Bar" and other stories of the road. The writing is done but the publishing part is just beginning. And you can help us.

Someone once said that everybody has one thing that they remember more than anything else in their life. It didn't take me long to realize that "one thing," Besides my family and friends it was a passion for driving across America and Canada any chance I get. On over a half million miles I always look for old highways, truck stops and cafes where I meet the strangers who give me moments of their lives.

This book is a collection of travel stories and I've posted 2 excerpts starting with the first one below. Besides them go to Galley where you can see more videos from my career and Perks, which are photographs and illustrations you can own,

From "Not Being John Malkovich" - Paris
"We began to walk towards the barber shop when a very large French-African man stopped us with a raised hand, which lowered until he was pointing at us. Then he looked straight at me and said those words. "John Malkovich." It wasn't the first time I was mistaken for the actor. I quietly said I wasn't. But he wasn't buying it. "You are John Malkovich". And with that he introduced himself as Etienne and took me by the arm and led me into the barber shop where several Africans stopped and looked at my brother and I. Etienne began to introduce me to the group while my brother couldn't believe it. Most of them smiled but one in particular was suspicious. Since they mostly spoke French and English I asked Etienne why this group argued all the time, as my brother and I had seen them do for the past few evenings. He smiled and said "Sports and politics."

I have a big wall map with highlighted highways and pins that identify every town and motel I've been to. It's from this that I remember a young highway flagger in Yellowstone talking about her life and the cowboy who appeared with cans of Bud to while away until the road was open. Or sitting with a Hollywood star in the Rocky Mountains or searching for aliens with my brother Dave in Roswell, NM. I realized that they were strong in my memory, as bright and sharp as if they were right beside me now. And it was time to tell their stories.

Stay with us.



What we need are Donations & you get Perks

First of all, the hardest part was to write the book which took about six months. So I'm not asking for funding for that. It's been written. What I need is to get funding in order to pay three people who will finish the job as well as shipping and other payments listed below.  For donations, we're offering Perks, my pro photographs and illustrations drawn by Adriana Guidi .

What you get is the satisfaction to help us out and getting some great photographs and illustrations for yourself. Since we don't have a publisher with pockets of money we have to look at crowdfunding to help us finish the project. We have strict rules to obey and indiegogo.com holds the donations until they complete an audit within 15 days.


So how much do we need?

I'm asking you for $2500 and here's where it's going:

  • Payment to Adriana Guidi, the illustrator.
  • Payment to the formatting specialist whose rate is lower than Amazon's rates.
  • Payment to the book cover designer including color images on front and back.
  • Payment to Indigogo platform fee at 5%.
  • 3rd party fees; 3% plus 30 cents per transaction for credit card and 3-5% for paypal.
  • Mailing costs to send perks to all of you donators. Wait till you see our extras.
  • Advertising will be used to promote the book sending copies to newspapers and anywhere else we can advertise.
  • Funds are held until we reach our goal at which point, depending on whether we are funded completely or not, we can decide to use the amount we get.

And I get nothing. That is until the books are being sold around the end of March.

  • NOTE for Canada book shipping: Costs to send to Canada is higher.

Above is a Perk illustration by Adriana that tells one of the stories in the collection about a famous hotel and a cat. See more perks in Gallery.



I love this sign. Speed limit in Montana. The book I wrote is far away from Hollywood except for two stories; The Movie Star and Pablo. along with Being John Malkovich story.  My small-town roots keep me going meeting people like a man who painted a mountain and in a desert and discovering the infamous "Jackalope" in Douglas Wyoming. And by the time you get through this you'll know them too.

    This photograph was taken while I was walking in the New Mexico village of Acoma. The original photograph is in a western Art Gallery in Los Angeles. Five copies will be available as a Perk in Gallery.


What's the risk?

What about risk we're taking? Besides having written twelve produced movies and rewritten ten more produced movies and five TV series. I also have written two books; one is Emperor of Mars which is a story about a twelve year old boy based on my early life in a small town. The other book, Working Writer's Screenplay is based on my teaching screenwriting at University of California L.A. (UCLA) one of the top universities in the world. Both books will be "Perks" for this project.

You can also find out my film credits on  Movie credits and My Film Blog which started in 2009 and continues to offer stories about the movie business, good and bad. I'm also on Facebook jim.makichuk and on youtube at jamakichuk.

So what will we risk, all of us? One of the biggest risks is done, the book is written unlike other crowdfunders. And you can be assured that the writing works, after all it's what I've done since grade school. And I've got team players to help.
 

So what happens when it all ends? Well, depending on the funding, it will be audited after 30 days by indiegogo.com and at the appropriate time will release the funding for the final work and sending the perks to everyone who donated money for them.

Here's another quick preview of another story.

From "A UFO Skeptic at the Holy Grail - New Mexico

"It's two in the morning, I awake to the sound of something incredibly powerful outside, seemingly hovering over the motel room I'm in. If this was L.A., I'd think it was just a police helicopter chasing down a carjacker. But this particular motel is in Roswell, New Mexico. It's where an alleged alien flying saucer crashed in 1947 and spawned a conspiracy debate that has become the foundation of the UFO industry as well as a cottage industry as well. I glance over at my brother's bed. Dave's sound asleep. He's why we're here, having convinced me into taking him to this part of the country by promising that we can visit Santa Fe. He's the family member who's into UFO's, MIB's, MUFON and other abbreviations I never knew existed. Outside, the sound is deep and trembling, I'm not dreaming, I check my wristwatch and look towards the window for those bright lights that streak into the room when aliens arrive."

Other stories deal with a secret military base, a woman who breaks the rules, 700 miles across the Canadian winter, a mysterious record album, a place called Rome, the inventor of the television screen and more, And of course a small-town bar. All stories are real and happened to me alone or with my brother Dave.



Other Ways You Can Help

Some people might not be able to contribute but that doesn't mean they can't help.
  • Pass the word; "How Not To Get Beat-Up In A Small-town Bar." It will always get a laugh and make people wonder what the story is about. Try it.
  • I'll send anyone 5 front covers to hand out, Just email me.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it. Thanks for dropping by, stay awhile, have a look at the Gallery at the top where you can see Perks.

And tell a friend. Or two.

And here's my dad in 1971, Sunday clothes, whose love of cars translated to me and my 1968 Mustang, Loved that car.
story_txt:
Who am I? I'm Jim Makichuk and have been in the film business for thirty-five years.  But there's another part of me. Highways, truck stops and people I meet on the road.  You'll discover them in a collection of stories in a book I call "How To Not Get Beat-Up In A Small-Town Bar" and other stories of the road. The writing is done but the publishing part is just beginning. And you can help us.



Someone once said that everybody has one thing that they remember more than anything else in their life. It didn't take me long to realize that "one thing," Besides my family and friends it was a passion for driving across America and Canada any chance I get. On over a half million miles I always look for old highways, truck stops and cafes where I meet the strangers who give me moments of their lives. This book is a collection of travel stories and I've posted 2 excerpts starting with the first one below. Besides them go to Galley where you can see more videos from my career and Perks, which are photographs and illustrations you can own, From "Not Being John Malkovich" - Paris"We began to walk towards the barber shop when a very large French-African man stopped us with a raised hand, which lowered until he was pointing at us. Then he looked straight at me and said those words. "John Malkovich." It wasn't the first time I was mistaken for the actor. I quietly said I wasn't. But he wasn't buying it. "You are John Malkovich". And with that he introduced himself as Etienne and took me by the arm and led me into the barber shop where several Africans stopped and looked at my brother and I. Etienne began to introduce me to the group while my brother couldn't believe it. Most of them smiled but one in particular was suspicious. Since they mostly spoke French and English I asked Etienne why this group argued all the time, as my brother and I had seen them do for the past few evenings. He smiled and said "Sports and politics." I have a big wall map with highlighted highways and pins that identify every town and motel I've been to. It's from this that I remember a young highway flagger in Yellowstone talking about her life and the cowboy who appeared with cans of Bud to while away until the road was open. Or sitting with a Hollywood star in the Rocky Mountains or searching for aliens with my brother Dave in Roswell, NM. I realized that they were strong in my memory, as bright and sharp as if they were right beside me now. And it was time to tell their stories.Stay with us.

story:
Short Summary

My name is K. Alex Shaw and I am the author of the recently published book: "The Bizarre Baby Name." I am seeking financial help to relaunch my book as a self-published author and to tour January - March 2016 benefiting the Children's Hospital of Nevada at UMC.

What We Need & What You Get

Back in May 2015, I made a public commitment on a Nevada news station promising the community that I will give back to the Children's Hospital of Nevada at UMC for every one of "The Bizarre Baby Name Book" sold through July 1, 2016. The seed money of $9000 will help me start my own publishing company, relaunch "The Bizarre Baby Name Book" as a self-published author, and raise funds nationwide for the public hospital benefiting children of Nevada and the entire West Coast.

After dealing with a well-known publishing house, I am so excited to start my own publishing company and maintain full control of my brand and books. The relaunch of "The Bizarre Baby Name Book" will include new chapters, and a new face for the book. The new book cover is cute, edgy and hilarious. Like me!

Furthermore, the funds will cover the transportation costs of the tour. I also love giveaways! So, I'll use a portion to create "cool" stuff you'll love to stop by and pick up from me when I'm in your city.

The Impact

I believe in what the Children's Hospital of Nevada at UMC is doing for children throughout the West Coast. I am joining an already established and strong family of supporters throughout the community and nation. I am reaching out to you, and asking you to support me as I support the children, nurses, doctors, and staff at the hospital. Some of whom share names like the ones in my book.

Although, I wrote "The Bizarre Baby Name Book" in jest, I take it seriously as an opportunity to give back to the community. If I am not able to raise the entire amount or more of the funds, I will give the entire amount raised to the Children's Hospital of Nevada at UMC and continue my quest to sell more books to be able to write them an even bigger check in July 2016.

Risks & Challenges

The major risk I may face to reach this goal is exposure. I don't have a huge fan base as a recently published author of a book people think is just a list of names.

Will people support me?

Will people show up to the book signings?

Will people buy the book?

Will people want to listen to radio interviews about me and "The Bizarre Baby Name Book"?

Will people want to read magazine articles featuring me and "The Bizarre Baby Name Book"?

Will Raven-Symone applaud my work?

Let's find out together!

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word, even if you're unable to donate today! 

You can connect with me on social media, share the campaign page with friends, family and any relevant audiences who might connect with the project.

I am so excited and can't wait to see you all on the tour! #kalexshaw

story:
A Food Memoir...

6 Years in the Making

ISBN : 978-981-09-6618-8

Who is Carol Selva Rajah?

Reviews

Contents

Sneak Peek...

to read more, visit www.akasaa.com/diningwithdragons

Author's Accolades


Exclusive... Read Excerpts!



how do you support this campaign?


pre-order the book and...

  • see your name in PRINT! The book will credit everyone who supports this campaign for the inaugural global edition.
  • receive an autographed copy and personal message from Chef Carol herself.
  • make it a once-in-a-lifetime gift for that special someone! Ships Nov 2015!


love the artwork? 

We're making this available for you to enjoy in the privacy of your own home. Reproductions of 8 original drawings can be yours. These hand-drawn artwork were commissioned specially for 'Dining With Dragons' and is illustrated  by the Hollywood artist of 'Scooby Doo',  Order your favourite ones or a full set of 6. We'll deliver it to your doorstep.  


Books 4 Schools

Our aim is to place Dining With Dragons in every rural public school in Malaysia.   
A Book Tour will include Carol speaking at under-resourced schools in the country, inspiring kids to dream big - if a small-town girl like herself can make good in life... so can they! 
Keep track of her progress via Facebook. Write to team@akasaa.com if you'd like to contribute more.

remember...

'Dining With Dragons' ships in November... just in time for Christmas! 

Thank you for helping us make this labour of love a reality!

story:
Dear Friends,

Many of you have donated to my earlier campaign, which ended a few days ago. I'm re-launching a new campaign to cover additional book tour spots that have been added and to try to reach my initial goal so that I can continue the wonderful journey ahead. A hearty thank you to all my generous supporters in advance! 

I’ll be coming to city near you this fall to present and sign copies of my debut literary novel, JUVENTUD, which will be published by Curbside Splendor in October, 2015, The above video features my exciting new book trailer. I hope you enjoy it! 

Here’s a brief summary of the novel, the “story behind the story,” and why I need your support:


Story Summary

Juventud explores the idealism of youth, the complexities of a ravaged country, and the stories we tell ourselves in order to survive. Growing up as the only daughter of a wealthy landowner in Santiago de Cali, Colombia, teenaged Mercedes Martinez knows a world of maids, armed guards, and private drivers. When she falls in love with Manuel, a fiery young activist with a passion for his faith and his country, she begins to understand the suffering of the desplazados who share her land. 

A startling discovery about her father forces Mercedes to doubt everything she thought she knew about her life, and she and Manuel make plans to run away together. But before they can, tragedy strikes in a single violent night. Mercedes flees Colombia for the United States and a life she never could have imagined. Fifteen years later, she returns to Colombia seeking the truth, but discovers that only more questions await.

   

My Journey  

This riveting story, part sociopolitical thriller and part love story, lyrically told, marks the culmination of the copious research and drafting which I began in 2009, and relied on the support of several writers’ colonies to complete, including Yaddo, Ragdale, the Virginia Center for the Creative Arts, and others. 

After so many years of working on the project, I am ecstatic that Juventud has found a home with the Chicago-based independent press, Curbside Splendor Publishing, and I am committed to bringing the novel to the widest audience possible upon its release this fall.  In the Northeast I am scheduled to present at the Burlington Book Festival, the Fall for the Book in Fairfax, VA, then will head to launch events in Chicago and Minneapolis, Boston and NYC. In November, the tour heads south and will include my home state of Florida, Savannah, Charleston, Charlotte, Nashville, and D.C. 


Why I Need Your Support

I need your help and support to cover travel expenses, lodging, and meals from when the launch starts at the end of September to early December, when I will be on leave from my part-time job at Bookmark It in Orlando, FL. While the publisher is arranging the tour, they are not funding it. My only source of income during the fall will be the online fiction workshop I’m teaching for UCF, which will allow me to maintain flexibility but will amount to a small paycheck that will just cover monthly essentials. 

I have a variety of donation levels and incentives to offer – but of course you may donate any amount you wish! I sincerely thank you for being a part of bringing this stunning and important novel—the first of many, I hope—into the world. Further information can be found on the press release and in my biography, provided here, as well as on my website,www.vanessablakeslee.com. 

                               


The Impact

Your support will make all the difference. Juventud  is a story I truly believe in, and I can't wait to embark on the exciting journey ahead. I've been fortunate enough to have my works published in a variety of journals, including The Southern Review,Green Mountain Review,The Paris Review Daily,The Globe and Mail, and Kenyon Review Online, among many others. My debut story collection, Train Shots, has taught me a lot about the publishing world, but my next endeavor will be the most challenging yet. Ultimately, with your help, it will be a valuable and unforgettable experience as I embark on a journey across the country to share my debut-novel with you.    


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please spread the word of my campaign and share this page with your friends, family, and colleagues. I appreciate whatever assistance you can provide in helping me realize the culmination of my years of research and writing, so that I can share my debut-novel with the world. Indiegogo has simple share tools, so don't forget to post this page to your Facebook, Twitter, or email. Thanks so much!

Share this link and spread the word!                              http://igg.me/at/vanessablakeslee

Pre-order “Juventud” here!

Follow my author page on Facebook. 900 followers and counting!

story:
What is Black00?

Eight years ago when Laton was kidnapped and tortured, she had killed to survive. Now that her baby brother becomes the latest victim of a wave of children abductions, her worst nightmare turns real. When the kidnappers set the ransom so high, as if counting on her inability to pay it off, she rushes to the authorities. Yet, the police seem to stonewall the investigation.

The only way for Laton to raise her brother’s ransom is to enlist herself as test subject in a lethal research. But if she is as good as dead, why do the attempts on her life start piling up?


A fast-paced thriller, placed in a science-fiction near-future setting, Black00 is a celebration of determination and resilience. Seen through the eyes of a sister and a brother, Laton and Sabin, the story follows their journey to find each other and unravel the mystery that ties their family to Black00.

With this story, I sought to reinterpret the thriller and science fiction genres in a more accessible form, even for fans unfamiliar with either one of these genres. The 100,000-word manuscript is complete and edited.


Who Created Black00?

I'm an author based in Massachusetts, invested body and soul into making Black00 a reality. Since my youth, I've been fascinated by all forms of art, from writing to music, painting, sculpture, and photography. For the last years I've been dedicated to blending my passion for storytelling with my formal business training and market analysis experience. I've been involved in various projects employing my skills in writing, editing, and visual arts. Aside from storytelling, I maintain a blog about the economic aspects of the publishing industry, while working as a software developer for business and statistical applications.

In order to bring Black00 to life, I've teamed up with some amazing people who gave their talent, time, and energy so you could enjoy a prime quality story.


How Will Your Money Be Used?

I've already invested some of my own money into this project--I'm supporting the costs of the structural edit and the line edit, along with all the costs of creating this campaign and designing the cover. Now that these production steps were taken, I need to raise $6,000 to get the first printing done--which includes the final proofread of the manuscript and shipping the books to you.

The larger the volume of total orders the lower the overall production and shipping cost that I will be able to negotiate.


  • What does the production cost of the physical books include? Manufacturing cost using 100% Forest-Stewardship-Council-certified paper and/or recycled paper + Proof copy + Set-up fee.
  • How are the ISBN costs calculated? Each format (softcover, hardcover, e-book) requires an individual ISBN number. The price is $125/one ISBN or $300/10 ISBN.
  • How are the IndieGoGo and Paypal fees calculated? 5% IndieGoGo + 3-5% Paypal transactions depending on your method of payment and geographical location + $0.30 fixed fee per transaction for U.S. (international fixed fee varies).

  • How is the shipping cost calculated? After lengthy research, I concluded that the best U.S. shipping rates are about $4.00 U.S. offered by USPS as media mail. For international orders, one of the printing companies offers a flat rate of $12.00/paperback and $15/hardcover for all zones outside the U.S. Then the shipping supplies have been added to obtain the final cost.

All shipping rates, particularly the international ones, are sensitive to fuel price variations. The comparative rates presented below were calculated at the end of May 2016, using the calculators provided by USPS, UPS, and various printing companies, which offer individual distribution options.


Publishing Timeline

To give you an idea of how long it will take to publish this book, here is the timeline for creating Black00.


The Perks

I added various perks available at different price ranges. I've included quite a few early-bird perks because I want a lot of people to be able to experience Black00. Please take a look at the right sidebar--if you like what you see, click on a reward category in order to pledge to Black00.



Any donation of $1 or more will get you a flash story never published before (not set in the Glaukos Universe) along with my thank-you message. I'll also update you with the progress of this project during production and printing, and add you to my website as an official supporter.

In addition, any donation of $4 or more plus the Early Bird Digital gets you a special digitally signed edition of the e-book. And because I don't want you to be locked-in by the brand of your first ereader, you'll receive the book in every available format (EPUB, MOBI, and PDF) so you can upload Black00 on any device you own. Please note that the EPUB format is compatible with iBooks.

Any pledge of $50 or more (made in any combination of perks or perks and extra contributions) will be listed in the Acknowledgements.

I tried to cover most perk bundling options, based on various printing format. However, if you'd like to get a different combination, please contact me. Also should you have suggestions about other perks you'd like to have or ways to support this project, feel free to contact me directly. I'm always open to new ideas.


Risks & Challenges

The overall risks are small. I have a Masters Degree in Resource Economics and years of experience as a market analyst. The manuscript is already completed and edited, the cover is designed, and I've identified a suitable printing company and rewards suppliers. The prices listed are based on in-depth research of various alternatives. The main challenges  are related to delays due to the printing process and distribution. Also individual items are being produced by independent developers--hence, there may be delays in distribution or suppliers may change their offers before I can place the IndieGoGo orders. If this happens, I will have to find an alternative printing company, alternative suppliers, and/or alternative distribution channels. However I am confident I can get Black00 safely into your hands.

Go Green

Without forests, humanity would face a bleak fate. Deforestation and forest degradation threaten the quality of the air we breathe, by adding up to 15% of global greenhouse gas emissions. Trees play the role of insulation for the planet and help to maintain stable temperatures, therefore controlling climate change.

I am passionate about promoting an eco-friendly mindset, which is why I've chosen to produce Black00 only from high quality sustainable and recycled paper. The physical books you'll receive will be printed 100% on Forest-Stewardship-Council-certified paper and/or recycled paper. For rewards, I'll use local suppliers in order to reduce the fuel consumption and therefore the carbon footprint.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't can't contribute, that's all right! Please share this campaign on your social media platforms and keep an eye out for updates. Using the IndieGoGo share tools helps this project too.

I'd love to hear your thoughts regarding Black00, so don't hesitate to use the comment section to reach me.


Thank you for bringing Black00 to life!
story_txt:
What is Black00?
 
Eight years ago when Laton was kidnapped and tortured, she had killed to survive. Now that her baby
brother becomes the latest victim of a wave of children abductions, her worst
nightmare turns real. When the kidnappers set the ransom so high, as if counting
on her inability to pay it off, she rushes to the authorities. Yet, the
police seem to stonewall the investigation. 

The only way for Laton to raise her brother’s ransom is to
enlist herself as test subject in a lethal research. But if she is as
good as dead, why do the attempts on her life start piling up?













A fast-paced thriller, placed in a science-fiction near-future setting, Black00 is a celebration of determination and resilience. Seen through the eyes of a sister and a brother, Laton and Sabin, the story follows their journey to find each other and unravel the mystery
that ties their family to Black00. With this story, I sought to reinterpret the 
thriller

story:
My name's Doug,

I've just completed a striking 2 page guide to modern philosophy discussing the intersect between morality and logic.
I need you to help provide funding to make it grow.


I'm not in this to get rich, just alleviate financial burdens. For every $1,000 milestone achieved the project will expanded by one additional page.


The appropriate links will be delivered to your email address a short time after you contribute $5 or more!!

If I had my say all the smartest lads in town would be walking around wearing sheets like this fellow:
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/...

story:
Soy Wilson Javier Cardozo. Hace 20 años que integro un grupo de gestión cultural uruguayo. Para conocerme, nada mejor que visitar el sitio web que da cuenta de las actividades a que estamos abocados desde siempre: abrelabios

Este proyecto es valioso y posible no solo por mi participación, sino fundamentalmente porque cuento con el apoyo (y la experiencia acumulada) de mis colegas de abrelabios. Es decir, soy la cara visible de la propuesta, pero su culminación exitosa se deberá a nuestro trabajo mancomunado. La colaboración que te pido se sumará a ese trabajo colectivo.

miniaturas a lo grande es un producto sencillo: la edición de una colección de 20 títulos de literatura latinoamericana (en formato de tarjeta personal) para distribución gratuita principalmente en centros educativos de nivel medio y/o superior. Seleccionaremos escritores reconocidos del ámbito latinoamericano (de habla hispana o portuguesa) y también escritores noveles para estimular sus capacidades creativas.

En suma, estamos hablando de una colección de literatura latinoamericana (con un tiraje de 500 ejemplares por título), lo que significa diez mil libros para distribución gratuita. Esa es la meta si alcanzáramos el monto total propuesto. En caso que fuera menor, llevaremos a cabo el proyecto pero de manera proporcional a los fondos recabados. Es decir, si solo recaudáramos un 10% editaremos mil libros para distribución gratuita de dos autores; si el 50%, cinco millares de la mitad de la colección; y así.

Aclaro que siempre nos preocupamos por promocionar la lectura y el libro, pero el público de referencia que alcanzamos era esencialmente metropolitano, de Montevideo. Ahora estamos esforzándonos por disminuir el acceso desigual que padece el resto del Uruguay a bienes inmateriales de esa categoría.

Yo tengo un interés particular y directo en este asunto, nací en una de las 18 localidades extrametropolitanas del país, además escribo y conozco las dificultades de edición y circulación de las obras literarias y los inconvenientes para el acceso a este tipo de bienes de las poblaciones que residen fuera de la capital nacional. Se puede conocer más sobre mí en mi micrositio personal.

miniaturas a lo grande se centrará en poblaciones estudiantiles por la capacidad de asimilación y reproducción que reconocemos en las franjas etarias que involucra y porque muchos de los integrantes del grupo abrelabios compartimos actividades docentes, a nivel formal e informal.

Intentaremos que los consumidores asimilen los valores intrínsecos del libro en tanto objeto cultural, valiéndonos de recursos tales como el diseño y el agregado de ilustraciones atractivas.

Queremos estimular las capacidades creativas y la socialización de textos de escritores noveles, por eso alternaremos nuevos escritores en una colección donde predominarán los que ya cuentan trayectoria en el ámbito latinoamericano.

Buscaremos potenciar el mercado de lectores que ya posean los escritores reconocidos que integran la colección y fortalecer el acceso de sus obras a lectores de niveles educativos medio y superior.

Esa es la propuesta. Más allá de los detalles en los que podemos profundizar si te interesara saber más.

No recurriría a este sistema si pudiéramos obtener los recursos de otras fuentes. Es decir, tu apoyo es fundamental para que una propuesta de esta categoría se implemente.

Planifiqué, si lográramos recaudar la totalidad del apoyo económico que necesitamos, varias recompensas para ustedes, nuestros colaboradores. E, incluso, sustitutivas (de menor porte) si obtuviéramos menos de lo previsto.

story:
Introducing Us:

On March 20th, 1996 Sally El Sayed was born. Realizing she couldn’t do this alone God sent Roua Aljied to be born on March 21st, 1996. Naturally, the two became best friends soon after meeting.  Sally has been drawing since the age of six and Roua has been writing for just as long. Their combined passion for art resulted in the idea for this joint project. A book of poetry and drawings: A work in progress. Roua who also goes by the name of Philosi-fire performs and writes poetry about social justice, heartbreak, and finding home.


Where the money is going:

We are looking to raise funds for the printing costs of the book. This includes the costs of formatting, printing, marketing, and our launch event! Any extra money raised will go towards printing more copies.


What else is there to know?

We are hoping to release our book for March, 2017 launching it just in time for the week of our 21st birthday. We are excited to be publishing our work for the first time and having our friendship on paper. To see more of Roua’s poetry follow her on Instagram or Facebook. To see Sally’s work you’ll have to wait for the book!


Facebook: facebook.com/philosifire/

Instagram: instagram.com/philosifire/

story:
Aracelia: help create the story!


  • My name is Cristiaan Brans, a fantasy enthusiast from the Netherlands, I'm passionate about stimulating art, creativity. A while back I started a project called Aracelia. This project brings various artists together to make an epic fantasy experience. The first three chapters are already created and I'm looking for your help to complete my epic story about Aracelia.



  • Aracelia is the daughter of captain Albert & Isabelle Albus. Her mother Isabelle tragically died when Aracelia was just 4 years old. Due to the long periods Albus spend at sea Aracelia has grown up in an orphanage. Aracelia is sixteen now and her father is due back soon. This is where the story starts.

  • The story of Aracelia is not just another fantasy book to read. It's an attempt by multiple artists to create more then just a book. We will combine, writing with visual art, voice-overs and  audio to create an unique and epic experience.

    Feel free to listen and read the first three chapters for free

  • Chapter #1  Aracelia sword
  • Chapter #2  Into the dark
  • Chapter #3 A cat may look at a king






What We Need & What You Get

  • The story of Aracelia is created by multiple artists, the artists love to work on this project and make something beautiful, but I'd like to compensate the artists for their time & effort as well. The money you donate will go towards the following:

  • Writers
  • Visual artists
  • Audio artists
  • Voice overs for the main characters
  • Voice over narrator

    Next to that we also need funding for

  • Website & hosting
  • Digital format creation
  • Bookbinding & shipment

    We've set up the basic structure and we hope that with your help we'll be able to complete the story. In return you will get a wonderful story to read, listen and view. You'll be able to digitally enjoy it as well as receive a hard or soft-cover edition of this book.



Your donation makes a difference

All artists joining in to help make this project are independent, young and live in various places across the globe. Already artists from Europe, North & South America & Asia have contributed to this project

  • By donating you are stimulating & helping young artists to create the awesome art they want and allowing them to make a living out of their talent.

Risks & Challenges

Working with multiple artists across the globe can be challenging. Therefore it's hard to put deadlines on delivery, if one of the artists is hindered somehow a chapter could easily be delayed.  To this to coordinate our efforts we use a professional collaboration tool called Samepage

If you donate I will guarantee full transparency on the progress of each chapter as  it gets created. You can choose to read along as they come or enjoy the full story later on.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please share my page or contact me directly at mail@aracelia.nl

story:
About the book...

'101 Reasons Why I Heart Edmonton' is a 280-page, 9"x12" glossy coffee table book chalked full of stunning photographs (including many by local photogs and artists), amazing local history and information, intriguing local facts, inspirational #yeg quotes, a foreword by Mayor Don Iveson, and even a poem written especially for this project by former Edmonton Youth Poet Laureate Charlotte Cranston. It also includes a print edition of 630 CHED & Santa's Anonymous iconic 'And a Creature Was Stirring' Christmas tale (by the late Jerry Forbes)!

Want a copy?!

If you would like a copy of '101 Reasons Why I Heart Edmonton,' it will set you back just $40 (+ $15 for shipping)!! This campaign ends in September, and the books will go to print soon after. I hope to have all books shipped out by October, or early November at the latest!

Other ways you can help...

If you are not able to help out in any sort of monetary form, I completely understand! But, there are always other ways you could help if you're interested, such as spreading the word about this campaign to your family, your friends, your co-workers, or even those weird neighbours that you keep Tweeting about! Share the campaign on your podcast or blog or Facebook or Twitter or Instagram, or even Tinder! I can use all the support I can get! Thank you! ;)

P.S. You can check out some pics of the inside of this book in the GALLERY section above!

@iheartedmonton
#yeglove

About the book...
'101 Reasons Why I Heart Edmonton' is a 280-page, 9"x12" glossy coffee table book chalked full of stunning photographs (including many by local photogs and artists), amazing local history and information, intriguing local facts, inspirational #yeg quotes, a foreword by Mayor Don Iveson, and even a poem written especially for this project by former Edmonton Youth Poet Laureate Charlotte Cranston. It also includes a print edition of 630 CHED & Santa's Anonymous iconic 'And a Creature Was Stirring' Christmas tale (by the late Jerry Forbes)!
  Want a copy?!
If you would like a copy of '101 Reasons Why I Heart Edmonton,' it will set you back just $40 (+ $15 for shipping)!! This campaign ends in September, and the books will go to print soon after. I hope to have all books shipped out by October, or early November at the latest! 
  Other ways you can help...If you are not able to help out in any sort of monetary form, I completely understand! But, there are always other ways you could help if you're interested, such as spreading the word about this campaign to your family, your friends, your co-workers, or even those weird neighbours that you keep Tweeting about! Share the campaign on your podcast or blog or Facebook or Twitter or Instagram, or even Tinder! I can use all the support I can get! Thank you! ;)P.S. You can check out some pics of the inside of this book in the GALLERY section above!@iheartedmonton#yeglove

story:
Thank you for taking the time to learn about my campaign!

My name is Tamás and I’m an avid reader and a big movie buff whose passion has always been fantasy.

As a kid, I’ve been weaned on fantasy books, movies and games which have fired my imagination and invited me to create a fantasy world of my own.

With a head teeming with stories and ideas, I've recently decided to turn this make-believe world existing only in my imagination into something more, something tangible, something exciting. So I started working on a fantasy novel.

I consider Tolkien, Lovecraft and William King my main sources of inspiration, whose mastery in creating mysterious worlds and unforgettable characters serve me as an example.

My biggest dream is to write and to have my works read and enjoyed by as many people as possible. My ambition is to entertain, to write books readers would immerse into with delight, reading them till the wee hours of the night, incapable of putting them down.

However, I need your help to make my dream come true.

Since I’d like to reach an international audience, I need my novel translated into English. English is not my native language and unfortunately, my English skills aren't advanced enough to allow me to write the novel in it, so I'd like to hire a professional translator to do the job. And I need YOUR help to make it possible.

If the campaign were successful, I would make my novel freely available on the internet, so you can plunge into the world I've dreamed up and decide whether you’d like to read more stories by me.

If you'd like to help me (or to read a damn good fantasy book), you can do it by donating or simply by sharing my project. Any and all help is very much appreciated. I hope it won't be long before you can read my novel!


Plot Summary

"Long live the king! Long live Erodin!”

The Southern Kingdom resounds with the praise of its monarch, lavishly celebrating his 50th year on the throne. However, behind this festive façade the country is seething with discontent. As the king's mind increasingly becomes clouded by paranoia, he no longer shies away from introducing radical means to rule his kingdom, pushing it into an army ruled, dictatorial state.

No wonder that the Falcons, the court's special corps of “fixers” have their hands full of work. Hardly having returned from their last quest, Elion and her team has been given another assignment: to investigate the cause of some mysterious disappearances occurring in the once-flourishing mining town of Wenheilm. And if being pressed for time weren't troublesome enough, they also have to put up with the king's overzealous son who foists himself upon them in an attempt to prove his worthiness to his dismissive father.


Characters

Elion is a young woman in her thirties. Her past experience has rendered her worldly-wise and shrewd. About twenty years ago, Elion became a member of the Falcons, when, thanks to her resourcefulness and command of languages, helped them to deal with a very delicate situation. They are currently employed in the king's service.

Erodal is the ruler of the Southern Kingdom. Despite his advanced age, he is still a vigorous, feisty man. Although he has always been very prudent, some believe that his excessive wariness is turning into paranoia and that he'll eventually lead the country to a full-scale bloody war...

Alton is the king's youngest son. Neglected by his father, he has grown a restless and foolhardy man, always trying to prove his aptitude to gain his father's admiration and love.

Doltan is the king's councillor, a true patriot with a healthy appetite for power. Many believe that this quick-witted, sensible man is aspiring to the throne – which, they add, probably wouldn't be such a bad change...


Why do I need 11.000 euros? 

 A part of the money goes for Indiegogo, when the campaign is successful. I also need to pay taxes, after the donations, so around 30% of the money is gone.

If the project is successful, certain fees and taxes are applied which means that about 30% of the money will be deducted.
The translation will cost about 4000€. The editing and correction will be around 1000€. For the illustrations I'll have to pay another 1000€.

Other expenses include royalty and advertising.

Don't forget! The novel will be downloadable from the internet FREE OF COST.

Other ways you can help

Let people know about Ransom for Freedom! Tell your friends, share it and follow the campaign. 

Ransom for Freedom is on Facebook and also has a website from now - check them out! Enjoy the amazing illustrations, discover the world!

Facebook: Ransom for Freedom

Website:    Ransom for Freedom

If you have any questions, please do no hesitate to contact me

E-mail: ransomforfreedom@hotmail.com

story:
Hi everyone, 

Thanks for checking out this campaign but it has been cancelled. God has provided funds via another source. Unfortunately, campaigns on this site can not be deleted. So it will run it's course till the end. As for the the contributions already made, you can choose to have your money returned to you or receive your book in December. Thanks a lot for your contribution. 

You have a great day!

Akwi. 

"It takes a village."

story:
Ce projet est le premier d'une longue série. Je navigue dans le monde du développement personnel depuis plus de 20 ans et la créativité fait partie de ma vie depuis ma naissance.

Elle m'a permis de grandir, d'évoluer et surtout de traverser des défis de vie particulièrement difficiles. Elle est à la base de notre capacité à voir, percevoir et accepter les opportunités que le vie nous offre, parfois très très subtilement ou de façon détournée ;).

C'est en cherchant pour moi-même, des idées, du soutien, que je me suis aperçue de plusieurs choses :

-Le développement personnel manque de légèreté et de plaisir. Se mettre en action pour changer et reprendre sa vie en main peux aussi se faire dans le plaisir d'évoluer et grandir. Les émotions, même difficiles à traverser peuvent faire partie d'une expérience positive et l'humour est un puissant catalyseur de changement. 

-Se mettre en action est LA clef, il ne suffit pas de vouloir, il faut être prêt à se mouiller.

-Un symbole vaut milles mots.

-Dans tous les livres de créativité que j'ai eu en main, il manquait couleurs et fantaisie pour la plupart.

J'ai donc développé ce projet comme j'aurais voulu le trouver pour moi-même. Un livre que l'on peut "gribouiller", que l'on DOIT "gribouiller" :)

Ayant accompagné des centaines de gens en hypno-coaching créatif à mon bureau, j'ai pu évaluer la pertinence et la magie de laisser son intelligence créative prendre le relais pour nous aider à avancer.

J'ai voulu partager cette "magie" avec le plus de monde possible à un coût beaucoup moins élevé que des consultations individuelles.

Les fiches pratiques sont déjà  avancées et je collabore avec une jeune entreprise de designers Pomme F, qui y met aussi beaucoup de cœur. 

Toutes les  personnes qui ont eu l'opportunité de voir le matériel déjà crée ont eu des commentaires vraiment très positifs et c'est super encourageant.

Votre participation à ce projet va faire une réelle différence dans le maintient des délais et la finalisation du projet. Vous pourrez ainsi recevoir la version numérique pour les fêtes , en avant première, et la version papier quelques semaines après bine avant sa sortie sur les tablettes.

Et vous savez quoi... le 23 septembre, le jour du grand final.... c'est mon anniversaire, on pourra fêter ça ensemble ;).


Un grand merci!!

story:
Help Translate and Publish “Det Globale Perspektiv”

Since 1998, Kersplebedeb Publishing has been a source of radical literature attempting to contribute to an understanding of how the world works, and to keeping alive (or rekindling) the memory of resistance. We've published works by J. Sakai, Butch Lee, Zak Cope, Sanyika Shakur, JMP, and numerous others, attempting to chart an innovative, radical, theoretical way forward in today’s neo-colonial terrain.

In the 1970s and 80s, Torkil Lauesen was a member of a clandestine communist cell which carried out a series of robberies in Denmark, netting very large sums which were then sent on to various national liberation movements in the Third World. Following their capture in 1989, Torkil would spend six years in prison. In 2016, Torkil’s book Det Globale Perspektiv was released in Denmark. In it, he explains how he sees the world political situation today, and his thoughts about the future.

Torkil’s books bridges the gap between Third Worldist theory, and the question of “What Is To Be Done?” in a First World context. It is an important contribution towards developing an effective political practice based on the realities of the global situation, avoiding the pitfalls of sugarcoating the situation with the First World populations, or of falling into pessimistic quietism. As Torkil says, “It is a book written by an activist, for activists. Global capitalism is heading into a deep structural crisis in the coming decades, so the objective conditions for radical change will be present, for better or for worse. The outcome will depend on us, the subjective forces.”

To make this book available in English, we will need funds to hire a translator and to help defray the printing costs. This is where your help can make a major difference!

 

What We Need

We need $4,500 to publish this book. This money will pay for:

  • The full translation costs ($3,000)
  • Roughly one third of the printing costs ($1,500)

We are looking for $6,000, as the various costs associated with Indiegogo, and with providing gifts to donors, are expected to account for one quarter of the total donations we receive (i.e. if one gives $100, Indiegogo will take $5, and the cost of mailing you the thank-you gift you will receive will be at least $20).

So long as $3,000 is raised, we will proceed with translation. The amount raised in excess will be used to help spread the book as far as possible.

 

The Global Perspective: Ethics, Politics, and Action in an Unequal World

Never before has the world been so starkly divided between the “haves” and the “have nots”. Never before has the global situation been accelerating so quickly. The Third World national liberation movements of the 20th century very much triggered the liberatory movements that did manage to emerge in the First World, and seemed for an all-too-brief moment to point to an escape hatch from history’s downward spiral ... but for many today that all seems like ancient history.

Torkil Lauesen was a participant in the communist and internationalist struggles during the tail end of the national liberation period, and today remains committed to the ideals that motivated him then.  The Global Perspective is an important contribution, bridging not only generations, but also the gap between theory and practice.

Kersplebedeb has published numerous books outlining the need for a global view, one that centers the struggles of the most oppressed, on a world scale. With your help, we will be able to add The Global Perspective to this list.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone has money to donate to a project, even though they may want to. We understand that completely. But even if you can’t make a donation at this point, there’s lots you can do to help us in this campaign:

  1. Please share this Indiegogo campaign on social media, i.e. facebook, twitter, and all those places. Consider reposting it on your website, in your newsletter, or anywhere else.
  2.  As we share news stories about The Global Perspective over the next month, please consider reposting these in your own networks.
  3. If you run a distro, work in a bookstore, or otherwise help disseminate literature, get in touch (info@kersplebedeb.com) and let’s see what we can do together to get our books out there.

Thanks for all your support!
